ColonySettler43.title: 정착민
ColonySettler43.desc:
NAME(은)는 새로운 세계의 정착민입니다.
이런 인생을 살려면 모든 기본적인 기술에 익숙해야 합니다.

MedievalFarmOaf58.title: 중세 농부
MedievalFarmOaf58.desc:
개간, 괭이질, 소 끌기, 손수레 밀기. 도랑 파기, 씨앗 심기, 수확 예측.
중세 농부들은 보통 수준의 교육도 받지 못했지만, 기술 없는 농사에 대해서는 상당한 전문가입니다. 따라서 지적이고 기술에 의존하는 능력은 없다고 볼 수 있습니다.

MedievalLord20.title: 중세 군주
MedievalLord20.desc:
NAME(은)는 산업계 미만 행성의 군주였습니다. HE 연회에 참석하고, 부하를 부리기도 하고, 약간의 무예도 익혔습니다.
HIS 매끈한 손은 평생 작업 도구를 잡아본 적이 없습니다. HE 신체노동을 격 떨어지는 일로 여깁니다.

UrbworldEntrepreneur55.title: 도시계 기업가
UrbworldEntrepreneur55.desc:
도시계에선 대부분이 고통받습니다. 그러나 누군가는 기업을 이끌어야 했습니다.
NAME(은)는 악수와 분석으로 사업의 기술을 배웠습니다. HE 사회 지능적 기계입니다.

DeepSpaceMiner11.title: 심우주 광부
DeepSpaceMiner11.desc: NAME(은)는 심우주 굴착기에 지내며 소행성에서 금속을 캐내는 힘든 일을 했습니다. HIS 신체기술은 매일 단련됐고, 사실 술집에서 싸울 때도 유용했습니다.

NavyScientist96.title: 해군 과학자
NavyScientist96.desc:
성간 전투는 기술로 승리하므로, 제국 해군은 항상 현대 기술의 정점에 서있습니다. 게다가, 우주에서 찾을 수 있는 초월적 유물을 제일 먼저 손에 넣을 수도 있습니다.
NAME(은)는 해군 과학시설에서 근무했습니다.

MilitaryCommissar49.title: 군대 정치장교
MilitaryCommissar49.desc: NAME(은)는 제국군 대대의 내부 첩보원장이었습니다. HE 부하를 충성을 다 하고, 명령 없이 후퇴하지 않도록 만들었습니다. 이런 일들로 HIS 평판이 안 좋았지만, 아주 미세한 반항의 기미라도 찾아내는 데 큰 도움이 되었습니다.

SpacePirate69.title: 우주 해적
SpacePirate69.desc: 정부가 약하고 사회기반이 얕은 곳에는 해적질이 득세하기 마련입니다. NAME(은)는 그러한 인간 존재 일부였고, 이익을 위해 평화로운 상선을 강탈하고 박살냈습니다.

PitBrawler20.title: 투기장 싸움꾼
PitBrawler20.desc: NAME(이)가 첫 싸움을 했을 때 9살이었습니다. HE 승리했지만, 더 중요한 건 관중들의 즐거움이었습니다. 생존할 수만 있다면 투기장은 꽤 넉넉한 벌이의 직업이었고, 심지어 많은 부분 합법이었습니다.

IllegalShipwright28.title: 불법 조선공
IllegalShipwright28.desc: 테라와트 수준의 감마 레이저 출력기를 화물 평저선에 장착하지 못하도록 하는 법이 있습니다. 특히 일반적인 통신 안테나처럼 위장하면 매복 공격에 너무 적합합니다. 그러나 NAME(은)는 법에 별로 흥미없는 손님들에게서 짭짤한 돈을 받을 수 있다는 걸 알아냈습니다.

Courtesean56.title: 매춘인
Courtesean56.desc: NAME(은)는 여러 행성의 사창가에서 수백 명의 손님에게 몸을 바쳤습니다. 그 결과로 HIS 마음의 상처뿐 아니라 거리에서 살아남는 지혜도 얻었습니다.

SpaceMarine10.title: 우주 해병
SpaceMarine10.desc: NAME(은)는 제국 해군의 전사였습니다. HIS 역할은 적 함선의 벽에 구멍을 뚫고, 승무원들을 쏴죽인 후 그 함선을 나포하는 것입니다. 그리고 뛰어났습니다.

Assassin35.title: 암살자
Assassin35.desc: NAME(은)는 전문 암살자였습니다. HE 차갑고 계산적이며 수입도 많았습니다. 이 사업에선 일말의 자비심조차 없는 게 자산입니다.

MedievalSlave75.title: 중세 노예
MedievalSlave75.desc: NAME(은)는 중세계에서 수레를 끌고 땅을 파며 자랐습니다. 단순한 육체노동이 주인의 채찍과 함께 HIS 가장 오랜 친구입니다. HE 9살 전까지 읽는 법을 몰랐습니다.

MedievalLordling62.title: 중세 소군주
MedievalLordling62.desc: NAME(은)는 어느 중세계 오래된 왕국의 하급 귀족이었습니다. HE 돌로 된 저택에서 하인들의 시중을 받으며 자랐습니다. 이런 삶은 어떤 생산적인 기술도 알려주지 않고, 신체노동을 피하게 만들었습니다. 그러나 HE 주변 사람들을 원하는 대로 부리는 기술은 일찍 익힐 수 있었습니다.

UrbworldUrchin46.title: 도시계 부랑아
UrbworldUrchin46.desc: 도시계는 고대의 산업시설들이 깊이 뻗치고, 사람과 독극물이 넘치는 곳입니다. NAME(은)는 그 속에서도 모두가 접근을 꺼리는 깊고 어두운 곳에서 자랐습니다. HE 단 한 조각의 음식을 위해 투쟁해야 했습니다.

VatgrownSoldier83.title: 인공배양 군인
VatgrownSoldier83.desc: NAME(은)는 사람이 아닌 파괴의 도구로 만들어졌습니다. 생체무기 연구기관에서 자라며 가속화된 성장 기간 동안 전투훈련을 거듭한 결과 HE 여전히 전투적인 성향을 띄고 사람을 어려워합니다.

Hermit87.title: 은둔자
Hermit87.desc: 다른 사람들의 압박을 이겨낼 수 없었던 NAME(은)는 HECAP가 살던 중간계의 번화한 도시를 등지고 야생의 간단한 삶을 선택했습니다. 그곳에서 HE 홀로 지내며 밭과 정원을 가꾸고 생존에 필요한 간단한 도구를 만들었습니다.

MidworldChef39.title: 중간계 주방장
MidworldChef39.desc: NAME(은)는 중간계에서 고급 레스토랑을 운영했습니다. HE 후원자들 사이에서 창조적인 요리로 유명했고, 직원들에게는 노동에 대한 업신여김으로 유명했습니다.

SicklyChild40.title: 병약한 아이
SicklyChild40.desc: NAME의 유년기는 희소한 질병으로 가득 차 있습니다. HE 연구 병동에 격리된 채 인간 접촉은 최소화됐고 신체적 운동도 거의 하지 않았습니다. 그러나 말끔한 병실 안에서 과학과 약에 대해서는 많이 배울 수 있었습니다.

MedievalMinstrel69.title: 중세 음악가
MedievalMinstrel69.desc:
NAME(은)는 중세계의 방랑 엔터테이너였습니다.
HE 언제나 이야기를 들려주거나 노래를 읊었고, 길에서 만날 위협에서 자신을 보호할 기술을 지녔습니다. 그러나, 힘든 신체노동을 해야 할 때는 이상하게 찾기 힘들었습니다.

Housemate5.title: 가정주부
Housemate5.desc: NAME(은)는 HIS 파트너가 밖에서 일하는 동안 집과 아이들을 보살폈습니다.

GlitterworldEmpath39.title: 번화계 공감능력자
GlitterworldEmpath39.desc: NAME(은)는 타인을 이해하고 충돌을 해소하는데 엄청난 재주를 지녔습니다. HE 공감능력자로 선택되어 집중된 훈련을 받았고, 덕분에 자연적인 능력은 극대화됐지만 아무도 해칠 수 없게 됐습니다.

ShelterChild65.title: 대피소 아이
ShelterChild65.desc: NAME(은)는 독성 물질로 덮인 세계 지하의 대피소에서 자랐습니다. HE 종합교육을 받았지만, 육체노동을 할 기회는 없었습니다.

MedievalDoctor6.title: 중세 의사
MedievalDoctor6.desc:
NAME(은)는 중세계에서 의사로 활동했습니다. HE 피를 약간 흘리면 대부분의 사소한 질병을 치료할 수 있다고 믿었습니다.
또한, 마취술의 달인이었는데, 환자의 머리를 강하게 내려치는 독창적인 기술을 사용했습니다.

Inventor42.title: 발명가
Inventor42.desc: HIS 고향에서, NAME(은)는 어느 정도 성공한 발명가의 삶을 살았습니다. HE 몇 개의 소소한 기술을 발명했습니다.

Teacher24.title: 교사
Teacher24.desc: NAME(은)는 진보적인 가르침을 받고 공립학교에서 가르쳤습니다. HE 넓은 지식으로 학생들과 교감을 줄곧 잘했습니다.

IndustrialOrphan55.title: 산업계 고아
IndustrialOrphan55.desc: NAME(은)는 HIS 부모를 알았던 적이 없습니다. HIS 가장 오랜 기억은 고향의 광산과 창고에서의 힘들었던 일과입니다. 당연하게도 제대로 된 교육은 받은 적이 없습니다.

Scout67.title: 정찰병
Scout67.desc: 조그마한 제국의 식민정에서 태어난 NAME(은)는 군의 정찰 기술을 가르치는 프로그램에 참여해 야생에서 살아남는 법, 복종하는 법, 질문하지 않는 법을 배웠습니다.

JoywireArtist62.title: 쾌락회로 예술가
JoywireArtist62.desc:
NAME(은)는 도시계 연구소에서 사용자의 만족도를 극대화하기 위한 최첨단 쾌락회로 소프트웨어를 연구했습니다.
지역 정부가 쾌락회로 생산에 강한 규제를 걸자 HE 작품을 암시장에 팔기 시작했습니다.

FrightenedChild6.title: 겁먹은 아이
FrightenedChild6.desc: NAME(은)는 유년기를 수도 없이 많은 공포증과 노이로제와 함께 보냈습니다. HE 의사와 식품으로 전파되는 병원균을 제일 두려워했습니다. 결과적으로 스스로 요리하고 보살피는 법을 배웠지만, 성인이 돼서도 공포가 HIM 괴롭힙니다.

ConceptualArtist7.title: 개념 예술가
ConceptualArtist7.desc:
NAME의 독특하고 창조적인 개념 예술품은 고향 예술계에서 유명했습니다.
아무도 HECAP가 뭘 말하려 하는지 몰랐지만, HIS 작품은 수집가들 사이에서 높은 평가를 받았습니다.

GlitterworldSurgeon7.title: 번화계 외과의
GlitterworldSurgeon7.desc:
NAME의 일터는 대부분 질병과 고통이 사라진 번화계 외과였습니다.
HIS 일과는 대부분 정교하고 창의적인 성형수술이었습니다. 인체에 대한 이해는 뛰어나지만, NAME(은)는 한 번도 암 조직이나 총알을 제거해본 적이 없습니다.

LudditeRebel42.title: 러다이트 반군
LudditeRebel42.desc: NAME의 고향 주민 대부분이 각자의 개성과 신체를 포기하고 네트워크 집단지성체로써 존재하기로 하자, HE 반군 세력에 합류해 대부분 기술을 저버렸습니다.

Bartender47.title: 바텐더
Bartender47.desc: NAME(은)는 더러운 우주 정거장에서 바텐더로 일했습니다. 업무의 3분의 1로는 음료를 섞었고, 3분의 1은 외교, 나머지는 손님의 머리를 내려치는 것이었습니다.

CaveworldTender5.title: 동굴계 감시인
CaveworldTender5.desc: NAME(은)는 인간이 살 수 없는 행성 깊은 곳의 복잡한 동굴망에서 살았습니다. HE 부족의 다른 아이들과 함께 버섯을 기르며 지냈습니다.

CaveworldTunneler74.title: 동굴계 땅굴쟁이
CaveworldTunneler74.desc: NAME(은)는 지하 동굴망에서 새로운 길을 뚫었습니다. HE 바위를 너무 잘 알아서 냄새만으로도 길을 찾을 지경입니다. Years underground have damaged his/hers vision, so He/She cant shoot very well.

HiveworldDrone29.title: 군락계 일꾼
HiveworldDrone29.desc: NAME(은)는 거대한 군락계 문명에서의 인격 없는 건설 일꾼이었습니다. 문명 전체를 상대로 한 잔혹한 사회적 실험에서 벗어난 이후로도 HE 창의적인 생각이나 리더십 발휘가 불가능합니다.

Evangelist66.title: 전도사
Evangelist66.desc: NAME(은)는 21번째 생일날 종교적 각성을 체험했고, 여생을 창조주의 말씀, 그분 문화의 아름다움, 그 특별한 치유법을 전파하리라 마음먹었습니다.

TunnelworldIlluminator50.title: 동굴계 인도자
TunnelworldIlluminator50.desc: 동굴 부족민들은 NAME처럼 뛰어난 시력을 가진 사람을 현자라고 칭하며 존경합니다. HE 어둠 속에서 길을 이끌고, 발광 버섯으로 땅을 팔 곳을 표시하며 다른 이들에게 위험요소를 알려줍니다.

Herbalist89.title: 약초 재배자
Herbalist89.desc: NAME(은)는 마을 근처의 숲에 살았습니다. 비록 많은 마을 사람들이 HIM 무서워했지만, 병에 걸린 마을 사람들은 HIM 방문해서 HIS 정원에서 재배된 허브들로 만들어진 연고와 습포제를 사곤 했습니다. HE 많은 돈을 벌기 위해서지만 그들을 도울 수 있어서 기뻤습니다.

ComaChild18.title: 혼수상태의 아이
ComaChild18.desc: 어릴 적 발생한 사고가 NAME(을)를 혼수상태에 빠지게 했습니다. HE 10대 시절이 거의 끝날 때까지 깨어나지 못했습니다. HIS 신체는 오랫동안 활동하지 않아서 회복되지 못했지만, 사람들은 HIS 이야기를 듣게 되면 HIM 가엾게 여깁니다.

CivilServant75.title: 공무원
CivilServant75.desc: NAME(은)는 거의 망해가는 관료제 정부의 하급 관리자로 일했습니다. HE 집에서 복잡한 서류를 작성하는 것과 사내 정치에 뛰어났습니다.

OrganFarm9.title: 장기 농사꾼
OrganFarm9.desc: NAME(은)는 불법적인 지하 장기 농장에서 자랐습니다. HIS 몸은 다친 용병들에게 이식하기 위한 유기물을 성장시키는 데 사용되었습니다. 비록 HIS 양육 과정이 HIM 겁에 질리게 내버려 두는 것뿐이긴 했지만, HECAP가 인간생물학에 대해 특별한 지식을 가질 수 있도록 했습니다.

AsceticPriest87.title: 금욕적인 사제
AsceticPriest87.desc: 침묵을 맹세하고 나서, NAME(은)는 남은 생애를 조용히 명상하며 보내기 위해 후미진 행성의 수도원에 들어갔습니다. HE 정원에서 채소를 기르고, 수도원의 지하 저장고에서 치즈를 만드는 데서 행복을 느꼈습니다.

EscapedConvict68.title: 탈출한 죄수
EscapedConvict68.desc: NAME(은)는 어떤 범죄 때문에 잔혹한 형벌이 행해지는 식민지에 보내지게 되었습니다. HE 그 범죄에 대해 결백을 주장했지만, 소용없었습니다. HE 직접 손본 날붙이를 이용해 아래에 구멍을 파서 탈출했습니다.

StarshipJanitor15.title: 우주선 관리인
StarshipJanitor15.desc: 다른 여행객들이 동면관 안에서 오랜 기간 잠든 상태로 우주를 항해하는 동안, NAME(은)는 우주선을 점검하고, 운항 시스템을 확인하고, 메카노이드에 윤활유를 치기 위해 주기적으로 깨어나야 했습니다.

Pyromaniac68.title: 방화광
Pyromaniac68.desc: 어린 시절부터, NAME(은)는 불에 비정상적으로 끌렸습니다. HE 쓰레기더미에 불을 지르고 멍하니 불꽃을 바라보며 빠져들곤 했습니다. 하루는, 성냥을 가지고 돌다가 실수로 HIS 집을 태워버리기도 했습니다.

Mute55.title: 벙어리
Mute55.desc: NAME(은)는 어릴 적에 겪은 일로 인해 큰 트라우마가 생겼습니다. 그 이후로 HE 다른 사람들에게 말을 하지 않았고, 대신에 집에 있는 여러 애완동물과 노는 것을 좋아했습니다.

Refugee70.title: 난민
Refugee70.desc: HECAP가 아직 아기일 때, NAME(이)가 사는 나라에 전쟁이 일어났습니다. HIS 부모님은 HECAP와 함께 안전한 곳을 찾으러 떠났습니다. NAME의 가장 오래된 기억은 HECAP 자신을 어떻게 지킬 수 있는지 배웠던 것입니다. HECAP가 목격한 폭력과 파괴는 HIS 삶에 상처를 남겼습니다.

MusicLover26.title: 음악 사랑꾼
MusicLover26.desc: 어릴 적에, NAME(은)는 악기 연주와 노래에 재능이 있었습니다. HE 전문 교육을 받았고, 연주회나 콘서트에서 공연하는 것을 좋아했습니다. 뭐, 후한 칭찬이 HIM 약간 자기중심적으로 만들긴 했습니다.

ChildStar51.title: 어린 스타
ChildStar51.desc: NAME(은)는 HECAP가 살던 행성에서 영화나 TV쇼에 나오는 어린 스타로 유명했습니다. HIS 명성은 HIM 다양한 사람들과 만나게 하였을 뿐만 아니라, HECAP가 이것저것 배울 수 있게도 해줬습니다.

ChildSpy95.title: 어린 스파이
ChildSpy95.desc: 아이들은 보통 순수하다고 여겨져서, 스파이로서 이상적입니다. NAME(은)는 HECAP가 겨우 9살일 때 잠입 기술과 정보 수집 방법을 훈련받았습니다. HECAP가 적진을 누비고 전쟁으로 황폐해진 HIS 행성을 돌아다니며 보낸 세월은, HECAP가 교육받을 기회가 거의 없었다는 것을 의미하기도 합니다.

Shopkeeper18.title: 장사꾼
Shopkeeper18.desc: NAME의 어머니는 자주 아팠습니다, 그래서 HECAP가 가게를 운영해서 버는 돈이 유일한 수입원이었습니다. HE HECAP가 파는 이국적인 공예품들에 대해서 조금 배웠고, 사고파는 노하우도 많이 늘었습니다.

Nurse0.title: 간호사
Nurse0.desc: NAME(은)는 산업 시대 병원에서 붕대를 갈거나 체온을 재는 것과 같이 판에 박힌 일들을 했습니다. 바쁜 일이긴 했지만, HE 언제나 환자들과 잡담하는 시간을 찾을 수 있었습니다.

HouseServant78.title: 가정집 하인
HouseServant78.desc: HECAP가 아직 한창 젊을 때, NAME(은)는 납치되어 어느 부유한 귀족들의 하인으로 팔려나갔습니다. HE는 주인의 저택에 있는 주방과 지하실에 대해 잘 알게 되었지만, 야외에서는 어떤 일도 하지 않았습니다.

Bodyguard22.title: 경호원
Bodyguard22.desc: NAME(은)는 중간계에서, 누구든 대가를 지급하면 위험으로부터 지켜주는 일을 찾았습니다. HE 온갖 종류의 전투 유형에 능숙해진 데다가, HECAP에게 거스른 자들에게는 무자비하다고 합니다.

Novelist96.title: 소설가
Novelist96.desc: NAME(은)는 번화계에 살면서, 아주 성공적인 소설을 썼습니다. HE 낮에는 글을 쓰고 밤에는 파티하면서 자유분방하게 살았습니다. 살면서 낮에 육체노동을 한 적은 한 번도 없습니다.

Mathematician46.title: 수학자
Mathematician46.desc:
NAME(은)는 대학에서 수학 연구를 진행했습니다.
HE 대부분의 여가를 사격 시뮬레이션에서 보냈지만 끔찍한 실력으로 다른 플레이어들의 놀림감이 되곤 했습니다.

Paramedic85.title: 구급대원
Paramedic85.desc: NAME의 일은 응급의료상황에 신속하게 출동하는 것이었습니다. HE 제한적인 의료용품만 가지고 심각한 부상을 치료하는 것에 익숙합니다. HE 오랜 기간 많은 총상을 치료해 왔기 때문에, 총을 보면 꺼림칙해 합니다.

Castaway74.title: 조난자
Castaway74.desc: NAME(은)는 사람이 살지 않는 동물계에서 난파한 배의 유일한 생존자입니다. HECAP가 구조되기까지 수년간, HE 찾을 수 있는 건 무엇이든지 구해왔습니다. HIS 생존 기술은 레이저같이 날카로워졌지만, 너무나 오랫동안 홀로 지내서 의사소통 능력이 약해졌습니다.

Gardener25.title: 정원사
Gardener25.desc: 산업계에서, 부는 공장을 소유하고, 상품을 파는 사람들에게 집중되어 있습니다. NAME(은)는 그런 부유한 가족의 저택에서 부리는 하인들의 일원으로서, 호화로운 정원을 가꾸는 일을 하였습니다.

MafiaBoss49.title: 마피아 두목
MafiaBoss49.desc: NAME(은)는 한 도시계 범죄 조직의 고위 간부였습니다. HE 공무원들에게 뇌물을 주었고, 부하들의 충성심을 유지했으며, 연체된 납부금을 뜯어냈습니다. 필요한 어떤 방법이든 써서 말입니다.

Torturer24.title: 고문 기술자
Torturer24.desc: 중세계의 한 폭군을 위해 일하면서, NAME(은)는 '설득'의 전문가라는 명성을 얻었습니다. 지하 감옥으로 끌려간 어떤 수감자도 비밀을 남길 수 없었습니다. NAME의 미소는 그들의 악몽 속에 영원히 남게 되었습니다.

ConstructionEngineer77.title: 건설 기술자
ConstructionEngineer77.desc: NAME(은)는 중간계에서 건설업에 종사했습니다. HE 사무실부터 대성당까지 다 짓는 팀을 이끌었습니다. HE 바쁘고, 근처에는 패스트푸드 가게가 무척 많았기 때문에 음식을 직접 만들어 본 적이 없습니다.

Blacksmith19.title: 대장장이
Blacksmith19.desc: 중세계의 대장장이로서, NAME(은) HIS 작품이 무척 뛰어난 것으로 유명했습니다. 또한, HE 자신이 만든 검을 다루는 데도 나쁘지 않았습니다.

CharityWorker80.title: 자선단체 직원
CharityWorker80.desc: 번화계는 그곳에 살 정도로 운이 좋은 사람에게는 안전하고 편안한 천국입니다. 그러나, NAME(은)는 빈곤으로 고통받는 주변 행성들을 무시할 수 없었습니다. HE 기부를 호소하고, 도움이 필요한 사람들을 지원해주는 일을 하였습니다.

Defector59.title: 탈주자
Defector59.desc: HECAP가 한창 젊은 나이일 때, NAME(은)는 억압적인 독재 국가에서 도망치기로 했습니다. HIS 탈출은 성공적이지 못했고, 요원들이 HIM 쫓기 위해 보내졌습니다. HE 수년간 도피하면서 자신의 부상은 스스로 치료했기 때문에 어떤 의사도 HIM 밀고할 수는 없었습니다. 이런 시련들이 HIM 배배 꼬이고 남을 믿지 못하는 성격으로 만들었습니다.

FactoryWorker82.title: 공장 노동자
FactoryWorker82.desc: NAME(은)는 산업시대의 공장에서 하찮은 단순노동에 종사했습니다. HIS 일에는 도시 여기저기로 상품을 수송하는 노새와 말을 돌보는 것도 포함되어 있었습니다.

RanchOwner88.title: 목장 주인
RanchOwner88.desc: NAME(은)는 성공적인 목장의 주인 겸 관리인이었습니다. HIS 농장에서는 고기와 털을 생산하기 위한 동물들을 길렀습니다. HE 일할 사람을 고용하는 것은 바보 같은 짓이라며 절대 하지 않았습니다.

LowWageWorker94.title: 저임금 노동자
LowWageWorker94.desc: NAME(은) HIS 가족들을 먹여 살리기 위해, 여러 가지 잡다한 일들을 하게 되었습니다. 그러면서, HE 여러 가지 기본적인 손재주들도 익힐 수 있었습니다.

Model51.title: 모델
Model51.desc: NAME(은)는 광고주들을 위해 옷이나 보석의 모델로 일했습니다. 또한, HE 가상 현실 시뮬레이션 속 캐릭터의 물리적인 모델로도 쓰였습니다.

Taxonomist49.title: 분류학자
Taxonomist49.desc: NAME(은)는 행성들을 여행하면서, 완벽한 일람표를 만들 수 있길 바라며 HECAP가 발견한 동식물의 삶을 연구하고 분류했습니다.

Geologist2.title: 지질학자
Geologist2.desc: NAME(은)는 광부와 동굴 굴착가들과 함께 일하면서, 암석의 종류와 자연적인 형성 과정을 확인했습니다. HECAP가 땅속에서 보낸 시간 동안, HE 드릴 기계와 다른 전문 장비들의 수리 경험을 쌓을 수 있었습니다.

ConventChild41.title: 수도원 아이
ConventChild41.desc: 불륜의 아이, NAME(은)는 중세 수도원 수녀들에 의해 거둬졌습니다. HE 고된 일과 복종의 가치를 배웠지만, 기술은 이단적이라고 가르침 받았습니다.

TestSubject75.title: 실험 대상
TestSubject75.desc: 가장 부패한 도시계에서, 도덕적 잣대가 없는 과학자들은 연구라는 이름으로 입에 담지 못할 잔악 행위를 저지릅니다. NAME(은)는 태어나자마자 밀폐된 시설에 홀로 남겨졌고 HIM 완벽한 슈퍼 솔져로 만들기 위해 다양한 행동 실험을 받았습니다.

MedicalAssistant75.title: 의학 조수
MedicalAssistant75.desc: NAME(은)는 양측 모두 대규모의 네이팜을 사용하는 비극적인 전쟁통에 태어났습니다. HE 의무실에서 HIS 부모님을 도우며 자랐고, 전장에 즐비한 끔찍한 화상 환자를 치료했습니다. HECAP에게 불은 트라우마로 남았습니다.

CultChild15.title: 사이비 아이
CultChild15.desc:
NAME(은)는 첨단 기술을 거부하는 강경한 사이비 집단에서 태어났고, 신성한 예술로 혼을 정화함으로써 모든 병이 치유될 수 있다고 믿었습니다.
HE 처음 외부 세계를 접한 후, 도망가기로 했습니다.

WreckageExplorer75.title: 잔해 탐험가
WreckageExplorer75.desc: NAME(이)가 태어나기 두 세대 전, 종말 전쟁으로 HIS 고향 행성은 무법 상태가 되었습니다. NAME에게는 HIS 부족을 지킬 책임이 있었지만, 행성 주변에 흩어진 추락한 전함들을 탐험하려고 책임을 회피하곤 했습니다.

ApocalypseSurvivor86.title: 종말의 생존자
ApocalypseSurvivor86.desc: NAME(은)는 HIS 고향이 기후 변화로 인한 대기근과 홍수로 종말 위기에 놓인, 불안정한 시기에 태어났습니다. HECAP가 자라면서 상황은 악화됐습니다. 수십억 명이 죽었고 평화롭던 국가가 무법 상태가 되었습니다. HIS 부모님과 NAME(은)는 살아남으려고 무슨 짓이든 했습니다.

StoryWriter68.title: 소설 작가
StoryWriter68.desc: 어렸을 때, NAME(은)는 독서 중독이었습니다. HE 지역 도서관에서 책에 코 박은 채 온종일을 보내곤 했습니다. 예산 삭감으로 인해 도서관이 폐쇄되자, NAME(은)는 방황했습니다. HE 부족함을 메우려고 HECAP 자신만의 이야기를 쓰기로 했습니다.

Sailor53.title: 선원
Sailor53.desc: NAME(은)는 답사 여정 동안 대양을 가로지르고, 이국적인 곳의 동식물 표본을 찾으며, 때로는 해적의 공격을 막아냈습니다. HE 바다를 너무 좋아해서 모은 보물을 파는 일을 제외하고, 땅 위에서 하는 최소한의 일 외에 모든 일을 거부했습니다.

Jailbird93.title: 상습범
Jailbird93.desc: NAME(은)는 일생 대부분을 감옥에서 보냈는데, 그곳에서 주방일을 맡아왔습니다. HE 싸우려는 기질이 있고 공격적인 말투를 가졌습니다.

Actor76.title: 배우
Actor76.desc: NAME(은)는 극단과 HIS 고향을 순회하며, 꽉 찬 극장과 사랑하는 관객을 위해 어디서든 공연했습니다. HE 완벽주의자여서, 가지고 있는 것만 쓰기보다 HECAP 자신만의 소품과 의상을 만들었습니다.

Tactician22.title: 전술가
Tactician22.desc: NAME(은)는 대규모 행성 전쟁이 빈번한, 불안정한 성계의 우주 해군에 입대했습니다. HE 전투에 예리한 감각이 있음이 드러나서, 이내 효과적으로 대군을 지휘하는 데 능숙해졌습니다.

GlitterworldOfficer93.title: 번화계 장교
GlitterworldOfficer93.desc:
번화계는 평화로운 곳이지만, 전쟁을 대비하는 경우가 많습니다. NAME의 부대는 실제 전투를 겪어보지도 못했습니다.
HE 예술적인 취미를 추구했지만, HIS 부대원들은 그들끼리 싸움을 즐겼기 때문에, NAME(은)는 싸움을 말리는 데 익숙했습니다.

Taster35.title: 감별사
Taster35.desc: 중세 왕의 감별사로서, 왕실 식탁에 올라가는 요리는 NAME(이)가 먼저 맛봐야 했습니다. HE 궁정에서 퇴폐적으로 살아서, 뚱뚱해지고 일은 거의 하지 않았습니다.

BiosphereManager30.title: 생태계 관리자
BiosphereManager30.desc: NAME(은)는 모든 하찮은 일은 로봇이 하고 사람들은 여가에 일생을 쏟는, 평화로운 번화계에서 태어났습니다. HE 사람들이 자연의 아름다움에 감상하려고 가는, 거대한 공원에서 동식물의 생태를 관리했습니다.

Veterinarian19.title: 수의사
Veterinarian19.desc: NAME(은)는 아프고 다친 동물들을 구하려고 치료해왔습니다. 동물들의 고통을 보는 일은 고기를 먹는 것에 대한 HIS 태도에 영향을 주었고, HE 고향의 육식 문화를 거부하고, 수년 동안 채식주의자로 살았습니다.

ExplosivesExpert30.title: 폭발물 전문가
ExplosivesExpert30.desc: NAME(은)는 광산에 고용된 폭발물 기술자였습니다. HE HIS 직업을 매우 진지하게 생각했고 전문성에 있어서 통달했습니다. 그래서 HE 철저히 계산된 폭발 후에 청소까지 도움으로써 위신을 떨어뜨리지 않으려고 했습니다.

Counselor20.title: 상담사
Counselor20.desc: NAME(이)가 젊었을 적 무서운 트라우마로 심각한 식사 장애가 있었습니다. 상담을 통해 HE 음식에 대해 건강한 마음을 가지는 법을 배웠고, HIS 새로운 기술로 다른 이들의 정서적 문제를 극복하는데 도움을 주려고 마음먹었습니다.

Recruiter51.title: 징병관
Recruiter51.desc:
NAME(은)는 전투 기술과 상처입지 않는 것으로 악명높은, 존경받는 무술가 조직의 일원이었습니다.
HE 고향을 여행하면서, 만난 젊은이들을 판단해 훈련에 적합하면 받아들이려고 했습니다.

PsychiatricPatient28.title: 정신병 환자
PsychiatricPatient28.desc:
NAME(은)는 성인이 된 후 대부분을 정신병동에서 보냈습니다. HIS 산업화된 고향에서는 정신 질환에 대한 이해가 부족해서, HE 사람이라기보다 동물로 취급되었습니다.
HE 결국 회복되어 풀려났지만, HIS 경험으로 기본적인 생활기술의 상당 부분이 약화되었습니다.

Drifter25.title: 떠돌이
Drifter25.desc:
NAME(은)는 HIS 삶에 무엇을 해야 할지 생각하지 않습니다. HE 머무른 곳 어디든 임시 노동을 하며, 자주 여행 다녔습니다.
또한 HE 관심 있는 출판사를 찾을 수만 있다면 베스트셀러가 될 거라 믿는 소설을 쓰기도 했습니다.

VRDesigner15.title: 가상현실 설계자
VRDesigner15.desc: NAME(은)는 번화계 사람들을 위한 가상 현실 시뮬레이션을 설계했습니다. HE HIS 세계를 더욱 현실적으로 만들려고 식물에 대한 모든 것을 배우기도 하는 등, 자잘한 것까지 큰 관심을 쏟았습니다.

HumanComputer63.title: 인간 컴퓨터
HumanComputer63.desc: NAME(은)는 뛰어난 기억력과 복잡한 계산을 암산할 수 있는 능력이 있다고 알려졌습니다. 한 중간계 독재자는 전자 컴퓨터가 해킹에 너무 취약해진 이후, 정부의 재정과 지출 관리자로 NAME(을)를 고용하기로 했습니다.

Architect11.title: 건축가
Architect11.desc: NAME(은)는 건물을 설계하고 건설했습니다. HIS 고향 번화계에서는, 건축의 기술적 측면 대부분은 인공지능이 처리했습니다. 이런 환경은 HIM 기술의 예술적 한계를 뛰어넘도록 했고, 건설 현장에서 HIS 손을 더럽힐 필요가 없었습니다.

MessageCarrier61.title: 전갈 배달부
MessageCarrier61.desc: 중세계에서, 전갈을 보내는 가장 빠른 방법은 말을 탄 누군가에게 맡기고 여정에서 살아남기를 바라는 것입니다. NAME(이)가 그 누군가였습니다.

Sculptor16.title: 조각가
Sculptor16.desc: NAME(은)는 사람 크기의 돌덩이를 조각하기 시작했지만, HE 곧 더 큰 것을 생각했습니다. 광산 로봇의 도움으로, HE 절벽에 거대한 기념물을 조각하는 법을 배웠습니다. 곧 HECAP가 살았던 번화계의 자연 공원은 거대한 암석 조각들로 가득찼습니다.

MachineCollector23.title: 기계 수집가
MachineCollector23.desc:
NAME(은)는 오래된 기계와 신비로운 기술들에 사로잡혔습니다. HE 어디서든 기계들을 얻어냈고, 개별적으로 어떻게 작동하는지 보는 것을 좋아했습니다.
HE 주변 사람들이 듣는 것을 멈춰도, HIS 수집품에 대해 오랫동안 얘기하는 습관이 있습니다.

Sheriff37.title: 보안관
Sheriff37.desc: NAME(은)는 외딴 산업 도시의 법 집행자였습니다. HE 거만한 태도와 야비한 구석으로 유명했습니다. HE 돈, 술 또는 복수를 위한 것이 아니면 손가락 까딱하지 않았습니다.

ConArtist96.title: 사기꾼
ConArtist96.desc: NAME(은)는 인생에서 어떤 것도 창출한 적 없습니다. HE 다른 이들이 스스로 만든 것을, 자연스럽게 HIM 주도록 했습니다.

Gatherer34.title: 채집가
Gatherer34.desc: NAME(은)는 채집 장인입니다. HE 식물, 뿌리, 열매에 대한 HIS 깊은 지식으로, 가장 척박한 땅에서도 식량을 찾을 수 있습니다.

Loner43.title: 외톨이
Loner43.desc:
외톨이는 부족회의나 연간 축제를 절대 좋아하지 않습니다. HE 넓은 평원과 바위 사이로 들리는 바람의 외로운 휘파람을 좋아합니다.
HE 가끔 부족을 방문하고, 대부분은 HIS 생존 기술로 자신을 돌보며 혼자 지냅니다.

AbandonedChild27.title: 버려진 아이
AbandonedChild27.desc: NAME(은)는 병약하게 태어났습니다. HECAP가 부족에게 부담만 된다 여겨, HIS 부모님은 HIM 비바람 속에 남겨두고 떠났습니다. 어찌 된 일인지, HE 살아남았습니다.

ReclusiveChild87.title: 은둔한 아이
ReclusiveChild87.desc: NAME(은)는 거의 5살이 될 때까지 말을 배우지 못했고, 심지어 그때까지도 배우지 않기를 원했습니다. HECAP가 10대 초반일 때, HE 마을에서 떠나 몇 주 동안 황무지에서 지내버릇했습니다.

Herder89.title: 목동
Herder89.desc: 어린 시절, NAME(은)는 부족의 머팔로 무리를 육식 동물로부터 안전하게 지켰고 병든 놈은 치료했습니다. 한적한 일이었지만, HE 사람들에게서 떨어지는 것을 즐겼습니다.

Scavenger86.title: 폐품수집가
Scavenger86.desc: (미번) NAME spent HIS childhood escaping grunt work to go digging through wrecks and ruins for treasures. HISCAP natural curiosity got HIM into a lot of trouble, but it also yielded many interesting finds.

CaveChild31.title: 동굴 아이
CaveChild31.desc: (미번) NAME grew up in a large and intricate cave complex that extended deep into a mountainside. HECAP helped the adults maintain and improve the deep caves.

SoleSurvivor85.title: 유일한 생존자
SoleSurvivor85.desc: (미번) NAME’s entire tribe was wiped out in a raid. Though HE was adopted by another group, HE was emotionally scarred, and preferred to stay near home, cooking and tending crops.

VengefulChild49.title: 복수심에 찬 아이
VengefulChild49.desc: (미번) As a child, NAME returned to HIS village to find that it had been wiped out by bandits. HECAP swore revenge on the attackers and began a violent rampage across the wilderness.

FireTender4.title: 불 감시인
FireTender4.desc: (미번) In HIS childhood, NAME was responsible for keeping the tribe’s fire going. HECAP took this responsibility very seriously.

Healer89.title: 치유사
Healer89.desc: (미번) After HIS tribe’s elder healer was killed in a raid, NAME took on the role. HECAP spent HIS days scrounging up herbs and mineral compounds from the nearby area to use in surprisingly effective remedies.

Scout93.title: 정찰병
Scout93.desc: (미번) Since HIS tribe has made contact with local outlanders, NAME has contracted HIS services out as a guide to the local area. Frequent contact with ancient relics has made HIM fairly comfortable with the old technology.

Digger58.title: 광부
Digger58.desc: (미번) NAME and HIS tribe carved their home deep into the side of a mountain. NAME feels most at home picking through rock and shoring up cave walls.

MuffaloShaman94.title: 머팔로 주술사
MuffaloShaman94.desc: (미번) Because of HIS quiet wisdom and great strength, NAME became the spiritual leader for a nomadic tribe that followed the herds of roaming muffalo.

LoreKeeper35.title: 전승 지킴이
LoreKeeper35.desc: (미번) NAME was one of a long line of lore keepers in HIS tribe. Every night around the fire, HECAP would pass on ancient knowledge and helpful wisdom through stories.

Weaver90.title: 직공
Weaver90.desc: (미번) NAME was an expert at working muffalo wool, plant fibres and natural dyes into beautiful clothing for HIS kin. HISCAP beautiful handicrafts were traded frequently between local tribes.

CaveTender26.title: 동굴 감시인
CaveTender26.desc: (미번) While the others were out hunting and foraging, NAME would stay at home to cook and take care of the young and sick.

Warrior37.title: 전사
Warrior37.desc: (미번) NAME was a fearsome warrior, proficient with many weapons. HECAP participated in many battles.

TribeChild78.title: 부족 아이
TribeChild78.desc:
(미번) NAME grew up in the tribe, running around the village, moving with the muffalo herds, learning essential skills from HIS parents.
HECAP never learned to read and never saw a machine that wasn't an ancient ruin.

FallenProdigy22.title: 타락한 영재
FallenProdigy22.desc:
(미번) NAME was born on a glitterworld falling into chaos. HISCAP father was killed in action.
HECAP struggled for a scholarship at Utmaior Academy and had to prove his right to be there. A child genius, HE was bullied as a charity case and couldn't make friends with the other kids.

MadScientist28.title: 미친 과학자
MadScientist28.desc:
(미번) Stripped of his life’s work and exiled after his unethical experiments on the survivors of the Callos IX incident were published, NAME learned the skills necessary to survive in the outer rim.
Continuing his research with nothing left to lose, he made minions to carry out the tasks that bored him.

FarmKid40.title: 농장 꼬마
FarmKid40.desc: (미번) NAME grew up on his family's beef farm. HECAP enjoyed working the fields and taking care of the animals.

CivilEngineer41.title: 토목 기술자
CivilEngineer41.desc: (미번) NAME was a well-known civil engineer. HISCAP job involved designing and maintaining rock fortification structures. HECAP did enough statistical analysis to keep his mind sharp.

FarmerBoy63.title: 농장 아이
FarmerBoy63.desc:
(미번) NAME's parents died in a fire when HECAP was seven. HECAP grew up on his uncle's farm, plowing fields and doing manual labor.
HECAP could not bear answering questions about his parents, so HECAP replaced social contact with hard work.

ArmyCook51.title: 취사병
ArmyCook51.desc: (미번) NAME joined the army as a worker and spent most of his time cooking and repairing. While he was stationed on a dangerous planet, he underwent basic shooting and survival training.

UrbworldCriminal64.title: 도시계 범죄자
UrbworldCriminal64.desc:
(미번) Born into bad circumstance on an overpopulated urbworld, NAME turned to small-time crime as a way to avoid starvation and hypothermia.
Robbery and murder were daily activities for him. NAME learned that surviving was winning.

UrbworldPolitican16.title: 도시계 정치인
UrbworldPolitican16.desc:
(미번) It's no secret that the Companies own much of the urbworlds, but someone has to take the bribes. NAME was one such figurehead.
HECAP learned how to manipulate the hopes and dreams of the people while living comfortably in a penthouse.

OptimisticChild43.title: 낙천적 아이
OptimisticChild43.desc: (미번) NAME was blessed with loving parents and a pleasant midworld life. He was an optimistic and sociable kid who loved making friends and listening to their stories. His imagination would run wild with ideas and questions.

GraphicDesigner99.title: 그래픽 디자이너
GraphicDesigner99.desc: (미번) NAME' interest in artistic expression led him to become a designer. His eye for detail made him a reasonably well-known artist on his planet, though his meticulousness often led him to spend too much time perfecting a single project.

Aristocrat7.title: 귀족
Aristocrat7.desc:
(미번) Born into an aristocratic family, NAME spent his younger years in blissful ignorance. His studies were sporadic and he never took a liking to anything involving his hands.
Fate, however, would force a change in habit. A global war broke out and the nukes melted the planet's surface into radioactive glass.

WastelandRuffian93.title: 황무지 무법자
WastelandRuffian93.desc:
(미번) Survival was a day-to-day struggle. Food usually consisted of half-decomposed animals, and water had to be condensed from the air. To survive, NAME became resourceful.
A surveyor from the Ordo Historia happened across NAME's world and rescued him.

UrbworldHooligan8.title: 도시계 난동꾼
UrbworldHooligan8.desc: (미번) NAME grew up in a dangerous urbworld. He quickly learned how to get his daily meal - by crime. Such means left little to no space for cooking and growing activities.

SpaceTechnician89.title: 우주 전문가
SpaceTechnician89.desc: (미번) NAME finally managed to flee his criminal life by getting a maintenance job on a nearby space station. He performed multiple repairing and building operations. He also used to participate in basic research activities and often defused co-workers' arguments. He never liked doing art.

TragicTwin21.title: 비극적 쌍둥이
TragicTwin21.desc: (미번) NAME was drawn to the water from an early age, and spent as much of his time as possible in and around it. His twin became trapped during a dive and did not survive. NAME never returned to the water again.

SpaceTraveler4.title: 우주 여행자
SpaceTraveler4.desc: (미번) NAME left his home behind, turning to the stars. He worked his way from planet to planet, taking on whatever jobs he could find to earn passage onward, rarely staying with a ship for long. Eventually he obtained his own vessel and has gradually attracted a quiet but effective crew.

IndworldUrchin11.title: 산업계 부랑아
IndworldUrchin11.desc: (미번) NAME grew up on the streets of a world in the early stages of its industrial revolution. HECAP passed HIS days stealing, begging and tinkering with discarded machine scraps, always on the lookout for a way to escape poverty.

DoomsdayPariah26.title: 심판의 날 부랑자
DoomsdayPariah26.desc: (미번) NAME managed to open a vault of otherworldly technology while scavenging a dig site. HE unwittingly triggered a doomsday device that cleansed the planet of all life. More interested in the tech than human life, HE boarded the vault’s spacecraft and departed to find more relics to abuse.

MechanoidNerd80.title: 메카노이드 덕후
MechanoidNerd80.desc:
(미번) NAME grew up in an urbworld as the only child of a pair of mechanoid designers. They encouraged HIS interest in the machines. Eventually, HE became obsessed with building HIS own.
Unfortunately this also lead to HIM being a loner as HE prefered technical books to friends.

MilitaryEngineer44.title: 군대 기술자
MilitaryEngineer44.desc:
(미번) NAME worked as an engineer for a colonial military. HECAP got to play with weapons, murder-drones, and other 'fun' stuff.
HECAP specialized in repairing and modifying mechanoids' tools. Sometimes HE tested them HIMself.

ShunnedGirl18.title: 기피하는 소녀
ShunnedGirl18.desc: (미번) NAME was born into a small, poor family. She was bullied relentlessly, beaten and hated. As she grew up she developed an interest in guns. She usually studied from books, but occasionally managed to get some practice time with the real thing. NAME later discovered a talent for art and began to teach herself how to draw and paint.

ArtStudent43.title: 미술 학생
ArtStudent43.desc: (미번) After years of practice, NAME was able to enrol into an art university and take her skills further. She sought art industry work after graduating with good grades. She made some progress with private commissions, managing to make a decent living from her art.

ColiseumCleaner12.title: 콜로세움 청소부
ColiseumCleaner12.desc: (미번) During the 'Inner Destrian War' fallout, HIS parents were captured and HE was born into a life of slavery. Forced to clean coliseums after bloody battles for money. Watching, waiting, and learning. Coliseums were the only thing HE ever knew. One night while cleaning the coliseum, HIS family was murdered.

ColiseumFighter29.title: 콜로세움 투사
ColiseumFighter29.desc: (미번) Applying the knowledge that he gained from years around fighters, HE became a successful gladiator in the coliseum that he once cleaned.

OfficerCadet81.title: 사관생도
OfficerCadet81.desc: (미번) From a young age, NAME trained to be a leader of men. He enrolled in the Vanu Defense College when he was a boy and became proficient with a range of weapons and survival techniques.

FighterController64.title: 전투기 관제사
FighterController64.desc: (미번) During the Zartha crisis, NAME fought across many worlds, providing the vital link between the ground and the air as a fighter controller. During the campaign, he saw friends injured and killed. This mental trauma haunts his dreams to this day, but his aim remains sharp.

ReclusiveProdigy98.title: 은둔한 영재
ReclusiveProdigy98.desc:
(미번) Growing up on a flourishing glitterworld afforded NAME the chance to fully devote herself to her studies.
Having taken a keen interest in genetic modification and neural augmentation from a young age, she had little time (or desire) for a regular childhood.

FerventResearcher44.title: 열렬한 연구원
FerventResearcher44.desc:
(미번) As a young adult, NAME was sure that her planet and its people were nearing their time of transcendence.
A firm belief that her research would be the catalyst drove her to increasingly alarming acts as bureaucrats and bioethics committees worked to stall her progress.

WarRefugee81.title: 전쟁 난민
WarRefugee81.desc:
(미번) A war broke on out NAME's home planet.
Gathering what little food and belongings they could, NAME and his father stole a ship and escaped into space.

VengefulExplorer48.title: 복수심에 찬 탐험가
VengefulExplorer48.desc:
(미번) A violent drifter without a home, NAME and his father fought many battles across hundreds of years. HECAP became a grizzled fighter and crack shot.
After his father's death in battle, NAME began exploring the stars alone, seeking his father's killer, on the hunt for revenge.

ToxicChild46.title: 중독된 아이
ToxicChild46.desc: (미번) Growing up on an Industrial planet, NAME started working in a chemical plant at the age of six. Years of exposure to industrial toxins left him physically and mentally scarred. HECAP eventually blew up the facility and escaped the planet in a stolen cargo ship.

CriminalTinker97.title: 범죄의 땜장이
CriminalTinker97.desc: (미번) NAME joined a crew of mercenaries, helping to maintain their fusion reactor and nuclear weapons. HECAP quickly became their leader's right hand and took over when the opportunity arose, connecting the leader's shower to the ship's waste disposal acid.

WorkCampSlave37.title: 노동수용소 노예
WorkCampSlave37.desc:
(미번) NAME grew up as a slave to a particularly nasty noble family on a medieval world.
While he received no formal education, the harsh labor regimen made his body strong.

BanishedSoldier4.title: 추방된 군인
BanishedSoldier4.desc:
(미번) NAME became the most physically intimidating of the slaves, spending his little free time obsessively sculpting his body. His efforts eventually paid off when the lord offered him a job as a personal bodyguard.
Later, when he plotted to use his position to kill the lord and free the slaves, he was discovered and barely escaped with his life.

DisciplinedFarmer44.title: 교육된 농부
DisciplinedFarmer44.desc: (미번) NAME was the younger of two sons on the family farm, a frontier plot that struggled to turn a profit. NAME's father was a strict disciplinarian, constantly at his sons to work harder and keep quiet. NAME burnt his hand making breakfast once and swore to cook only when his life was in danger.

StalwartFarmer89.title: 충실한 농부
StalwartFarmer89.desc: (미번) With the farm under constant threat from brigands, NAME learned to defend himself with his father's hunting rifle. He also mastered how to construct fences to keep livestock in and the local wildlife out. NAME tried to paint a picture of his home and learned he can only draw scribbles and ducks.

Dreamer99.title: 몽상가
Dreamer99.desc:
(미번) Since his father was often away, NAME took the role of man of the house. He learned the value of hard work, but never really had a childhood.
Every day, NAME dreamed of leaving his home and exploring new worlds.

PirateSurveyor66.title: 해적 측량사
PirateSurveyor66.desc:
(미번) As a surveyor for Geotek Corporation, NAME's job was to search for new salvage sites. However, his real desire was to find an ancient artifact amongst the ruins to sell on the black market.
When he finally stumbled across one, the company tried to retrieve it by force. NAME escaped with his bounty and began a life of piracy.

VoyagerChild9.title: 항해자 아이
VoyagerChild9.desc:
(미번) NAME was raised on an R&D starship, and spent most of HIS childhood travelling through the void.
Approaching a mysterious planetoid, the ship was severely damaged. HIS next memory is of the ship heading out of orbit, fully repaired. HE soon developed an unnatural gift for technological research.

SpaceResearcher5.title: 우주 연구원
SpaceResearcher5.desc:
(미번) NAME inherited HIS parents' ship and carried on their research.
HISCAP childhood experiences with diverse cultures allowed HIM to preserve his caring nature despite spending most of HIS life isolated in space.

VatgrownMedic86.title: 인공배양 간호병
VatgrownMedic86.desc: (미번) Raised to be a combat medic, NAME was trained in firearms as well as medicine. His favorite phrase when coming upon a wounded soldier was "Life or death?" Most chose life.

GeneticScientist4.title: 유전학 과학자
GeneticScientist4.desc: (미번) After the war he joined a genetic engineering firm. He worked on enhancements for humans and livestock. His experiences in inflicting and healing wounds were very beneficial to his work, but he developed a black sense of humor. This made social gatherings awkward.

CoreDilettante99.title: 도심의 예술애호가
CoreDilettante99.desc:
(미번) NAME spent her formative years on a glitterworld in the core region, where she and her friends pursued lives of idle pleasure.
As she grew up, she began to find the life of ease unfulfilling. She decided to look for a more challenging path.

Reporter51.title: 기자
Reporter51.desc:
(미번) NAME spent many years as an investigative reporter. She was notorious for making chaotic reports from exotic locations.
Although seen as a lightweight by her critics, she managed to break several high-profile stories after lengthy investigations.

AspiringPopIdol61.title: 아이돌 지망생
AspiringPopIdol61.desc:
NAME(은)는 회사 매니저들의 보살핌을 받으며 다음번 대세 아이돌이 되기 위한 노래와 안무 연습을 거쳤습니다.
직접 일은 해본 적이 없지만 음악과 몸가짐에 대해서는 많이 배울 수 있었습니다.

PopIdol50.title: 아이돌
PopIdol50.desc: NAME(은)는 공연과 인터뷰를 자주 진행했고, 덕분에 노래와 안무 실력은 물론 다른 사람과의 소통에도 뛰어납니다.

FarmBoy56.title: 농장 아이
FarmBoy56.desc:
(미번) NAME worked on his family's farm, looking after the animals and treating them when they were injured. Preferring hands-on tasks and the outdoors, he avoided softer jobs that might have kept him cooped up inside.
He enjoyed this lonely work, and tended to stay out of people's way and do his own thing.

UnstableButcher98.title: 불안정한 도살자
UnstableButcher98.desc: (미번) NAME began hearing voices. The animals were talking to him, insulting him. He came to hate them, and eventually killed his furry former friends. He started selling the meat just to get human interaction.

StationWhelp51.title: 정거장 꼬마
StationWhelp51.desc: (미번) NAME spent his childhood as a penniless orphan living on a space station. He managed to scrape by doing filthy jobs and stealing. He became so violent due to poor treatment by his “betters” that he was banished from the station, just to be picked up by space pirates.

PirateKing62.title: 해적 왕
PirateKing62.desc: (미번) With no real care for other people, NAME fit in perfectly with the pirate crew that he had once been a captive of. Shortly after becoming one of the crew, NAME began to kill anyone or anything that got in his way—including his crew mates.

ConstructionGrunt79.title: 건설 도우미
ConstructionGrunt79.desc:
(미번) Growing up in his father's lab, NAME was given the life of an intellectual elite. He got everything he desired, and price was never an object.
However NAME did not partake in the luxury given to him. Instead, he pursued more physical, and - in his father's eyes - lower-class jobs.

MilitaryInventor44.title: 군대 발명가
MilitaryInventor44.desc:
(미번) NAME, in a final act of rebellion, left his father's lab and joined the local Imperial military.
He used his laboratory skills to design machines of war. At this he was one of the best on his planet.

StudentEngineer40.title: 공학 학생
StudentEngineer40.desc:
(미번) A genius child, NAME was put in a special training program covering aerospace warfare and engineering.
One day, he tried to befriend a squirrel by giving it a bracelet. The squirrel bit him, earning him the nickname Squirrel Boy. NAME came to believe that work involving manual labor is beneath HIM.

EngineeredPilot99.title: 공학도 조종사
EngineeredPilot99.desc:
(미번) After his province was besieged by one of its neighbors, NAME volunteered for a generic modification program that created pilots for the very fighter craft that he had helped develop. The modifications allowed him to pilot the ship, but also made him less able to focus on the people around him.
By this time, people were calling him "Squirrel."

StreetKid29.title: 길바닥 꼬마
StreetKid29.desc:
(미번) Growing up on the streets of the a desert planet, NAME's his only friend was a dog named Rest. The pair scraped by, finding just enough food to survive.
When HE was 13 years old, an interplanetary criminal group took HIM under their wing.

BanditLeader92.title: 도적 두목
BanditLeader92.desc: (미번) NAME rose up the ranks of the crime organization, eventually becoming the leader of one of their most remote cells of bandits. His dog Rest never left his side.

FrontierMarshal0.title: 국경 보안관
FrontierMarshal0.desc:
(미번) NAME inherited a sense of duty from his father, and began a law enforcement career on his frontier homeworld.
He tried to uphold the law with honor, but the corruption and greed of local government officials often discouraged him.

ColonialGovernor77.title: 식민지 총독
ColonialGovernor77.desc:
(미번) Disillusioned by rampant government corruption, NAME ran for governor and won. However, the local gangs and their pet officials soon forced him out of power.
He left the community to return to his life as a marshal.

MercenaryRecruit12.title: 용병 신입
MercenaryRecruit12.desc:
(미번) Descended from a long line of off-world mercenaries, NAME grew up in a busy trading hub.
HISCAP's interest in the foreign goods at the market often distracted him from his chores and training.

MercenaryChef30.title: 용병 주방장
MercenaryChef30.desc:
(미번) Following in his family's footsteps, NAME was a soldier for hire.
He is a naturally gifted sharpshooter. However, his real passion is in perfecting a new recipe or dissecting a new gadget.

AbandonedChild78.title: 버려진 아이
AbandonedChild78.desc: (미번) NAME was a quick witted, funny child. One day, HE wandered off on HIS wealthy genetic parents, and was ultimately lost in a supposedly unused ore warehouse. Due to cloning technology, HIS parents decided that the time looking for HIM was better spent on just cloning a better son.

CargoPilot0.title: 화물선 조종사
CargoPilot0.desc: (미번) NAME was brought up by cargo hands on a long-haul ore transport ship. HECAP perfected HIS skills at trading and manipulation of people while running weapons between systems.

TradersChild31.title: 상인의 아이
TradersChild31.desc:
(미번) NAME grew up in a family of nomadic traders, making a living from selling and buying goods on many worlds.
NAME learned the customs and methods of trade of many cultures by participating in his parents' business.

SpaceHumanitarian98.title: 우주 인도주의자
SpaceHumanitarian98.desc: (미번) After seeing the rampant poverty common on overcrowded urban worlds, NAME decided to dedicate HIS life to helping the less fortunate. This crusade taught HIM how to care for the sick and the hungry.

CorpStudent17.title: 승계 수업생
CorpStudent17.desc:
(미번) NAME was bred to become an executive officer for the large space trading corporation that owned his home planet. His family had been working for that corporation for seven generations.
At age six, HE started to study at the corporate academy, where he learned to become a loyal follower and a ruthless executive.

ExecutiveOfficer58.title: 최고 경영자
ExecutiveOfficer58.desc:
(미번) NAME was an executive officer for a large space trading corporation. After a failed attempt at manipulating his way up the corporate ladder, he was framed for the rape and murder of another executive and her family.
He was found guilty. However, because of his family's influence, he was exiled instead of put to death.

VRAddict62.title: 가상현실 중독자
VRAddict62.desc: (미번) NAME was a VR head - someone who is permanently jacked into the virtual gaming universe by his spinal plug. He moved through his daily tasks barely aware of the physical reality around him. This left him nearly unable to socialize.

RugbyPlayer15.title: 럭비 선수
RugbyPlayer15.desc:
(미번) After years of addiction to virtual reality games, NAME was saved when the doctors unplugged him.
Unfortunately, they unplugged him during a match of Rugby Rampage 4. The mental backlash merged his real identity and his virtual identity, leaving him with the personality and skills of a rugby player.

Nerd92.title: 덕후
Nerd92.desc:
(미번) NAME was curious about everything. While other kids played tag in the suburbs of their industrial city, NAME read every book he could find about technology, robots, and weapons - whatever looked coolest.
His strong French accent kept him from making real friends.

StateEngineer74.title: 정부 기술자
StateEngineer74.desc:
(미번) NAME enrolled in the state weapons research program.
While brilliant in his work, he was so enthusiastic in testing his creations that he accidentally wounded some colleagues and was marked as unfit for service.

RebelSlave42.title: 반군 노예
RebelSlave42.desc:
(미번) NAME was born into corporate slavery and raised to perform menial tasks for minimum pay. HECAP was just another cog in the machine.
NAME found his freedom by joining a rebel organization whose goal was to break free from their corporate masters.

CombatNegotiator51.title: 전투 협상가
CombatNegotiator51.desc:
(미번) After escaping his homeworld, NAME took his skills to the stars.
He chose to operate as a hired gun, working for various rebel organizations, enslaved groups, and merchant enclaves. His specialty was negotiation in combat situations.

MedievalPlower12.title: 중세 시골뜨기
MedievalPlower12.desc: (미번) NAME lived on a planet where kings and queens ruled with little regard for the peasants beneath them. HISCAP family owned a large farm, but the king took most of the food it produced. This left NAME's family poor, and unable to pay for HIS education. Instead, HE was required to work the fields with HIS parents, and never had time to practice creativity.

SpaceStationCook63.title: 우주 정거장 요리사
SpaceStationCook63.desc: (미번) The space station NAME came from was far from any populated planets, and was in itself understaffed. For this reason, NAME was forced to learn how to cook in order to keep the crew alive. While HE appreciated this learning opportunity, HE didn't appreciate the criticism which came with it, and has had self-esteem issues ever since.

SonOfAHuntress96.title: 사냥여제의 후손
SonOfAHuntress96.desc:
(미번) In the mountains of the planet Ticonderoga, Jon was raised by his tribal mother. She taught him survival skills - trapping, tracking, shooting, skinning, cooking and healing.
His departed father had left behind an old bolt-action rifle, and Jon practiced with it every chance he got.

SpaceHunter67.title: 우주 사냥꾼
SpaceHunter67.desc: (미번) Now a man as well as proficient hunter and marksman, Jon yearned for more. He took leave from his birth world, traveling the great expanse in search of exotic game.

StudentSocialite73.title: 사교계 학생
StudentSocialite73.desc:
(미번) Matis learned politics in an elite training school for socially gifted students on Kalthas IV.
While he was naturally adept at reading and manipulating people, he found no joy in it. He left the academy several years before graduation.

PoliticalAssassin87.title: 정치적 암살자
PoliticalAssassin87.desc:
(미번) Matis realized that his true calling was in physical solutions to diplomatic problems. He sought training from the assassins guild on Ceti V.
He was a quick study at the arts of subterfuge and death. He soon earned the guild rank of Deathjack.

AwkwardNerd12.title: 꼴사나운 덕후
AwkwardNerd12.desc: (미번) Always fascinated by machines, Dave spent his time studying robotics and holography. He preferred the company of his scientific creations to that of other people.

AIResearcher30.title: 인공지능 연구원
AIResearcher30.desc: (미번) Dave was a renowned researcher in artificial intelligence, robotics, and interactive holography. His friendships with the artificial minds he created gave him the confidence to interact with real people, and he soon excelled at personal communication.

MidworldGeek88.title: 중간계 괴짜
MidworldGeek88.desc: (미번) NAME grew up in a quiet suburban neighborhood. He was never a master of social interaction, but his interest in computers blossomed into a true talent at an early age.

ArmyScientist54.title: 군대 과학자
ArmyScientist54.desc: (미번) NAME did scientific research for a planetary army. HECAP studied war scenarios and designed weapon systems to help win battles with a minimum of fuss.

CatHerder45.title: 고양이 목동
CatHerder45.desc:
(미번) NAME helped out in his father's cat breeding business, socializing, herding, and feeding hundreds of cats.
When he refused to clean up after the cats, HE was transferred to the breeding science division.

FelineScientist25.title: 고양이과 과학자
FelineScientist25.desc: (미번) NAME became a renowned scientist in the field of felines. Wanting the best for his animals and specializing in selective breeding, he set out on a journey to find the perfect breeding grounds for his cats.

Scavenger26.title: 폐품수집가
Scavenger26.desc:
(미번) NAME grew up in one of the few remaining cities on a world ravaged by nuclear war.
HECAP learned to survive on HIS own in this post-apocalyptic wasteland by scavenging for technology and supplies.

SpaceMarine90.title: 우주 해병
SpaceMarine90.desc:
(미번) NAME was recruited into the security forces of an off-planet corporation.
HECAP defended their ships against pirates and engaged in private space warfare contracts.

VatgrownAssassin17.title: 인공배양 암살자
VatgrownAssassin17.desc: (미번) Vas was not made as a man, but a cold hearted assassin. He was bio-engineered by scientists, and trained as a killer. He was bred to have no emotion, no feelings, and no care for who lives, and who dies.

Mercenary40.title: 용병
Mercenary40.desc: (미번) Vas spent his teenage years as a mercenary, being hired to kill and maim others. He was tall, menacing, and frightening. He could instill fear into the hearts of any man who crossed him, and kill anyone he wanted.

HiveWorldChild62.title: 군락계 아이
HiveWorldChild62.desc:
(미번) NAME had an isolated upbringing in an urbworld hive city. His hatred of heights kept him indoors often, and made him an introverted child.
When HE did go out onto the catwalks of the city, HE enjoyed playing war games, becoming proficient with various simulation weapons.

Microbiologist37.title: 미생물학자
Microbiologist37.desc:
(미번) A plague struck NAME's native urbworld. NAME and other researchers revealed that the illness was a bioweapon, but the people turned on them, blaming them for the sickness.
NAME barely escaped his homeworld as it fell into chaos.

StarforceCadet91.title: 스타포스 생도
StarforceCadet91.desc:
제국의 번화계 수도 아멘-티에서 자란 NAME(은)는 편한 유년기를 보냈습니다.
소년 시절, NAME(은)는 제국에 보답할 수 있도록 스타포스에 입대했습니다.

AceFighterPilot70.title: 최우수 전투기 조종사
AceFighterPilot70.desc:
NAME(은)는 스타 아카데미를 명예롭게 졸업한 후, 보다 우월하고 공격적인 적대 문명을 상대로 한, 세 번의 작전에서 최우수 전투기 조종사으로서 두각을 보였습니다.
그러나 어느 치열한 전투 후에 HIS 모함은 파괴되고 자기자신도 고립되고 말았습니다. 어떤 곳으로도 갈 수 없자, HE 탈출 포드에 탑승한 후 기도했습니다.

Stableboy75.title: 마구간지기
Stableboy75.desc:
NAME(은)는 중세계의 마구간지기였고, 생활비를 벌기 위해 거의 매일같이 똥을 치워야 했습니다.
유년기를 벗어날 즈음, HE 그간 모아놓은 돈으로 우주 상인에게 부탁해 고향을 떠날 수 있었습니다.

Brigand23.title: 도적
Brigand23.desc: (미번) NAME(은)는 한 때 HECAP가 친구라고 불렀던 도적단과 항해했습니다. 심지어 자기 소유의 우주선 '똥쟁이 2000'도 있었습니다.

ArtfulDodger87.title: 교묘한 기피자
ArtfulDodger87.desc:
(미번) Robin grew up on one of the urbworlds and had to fend for himself all his life. He never trusted anyone, relying on his persuasiveness and cunning to survive.
He soon became skilled with firearms and knives as well as words.

Assassin16.title: 암살자
Assassin16.desc:
(미번) Robin was specially trained as an operative to be used for high-risk assassinations. His skill with a rifle was unrivalled.
He was eventually betrayed by his superiors when a target found out about the hit and offered to fund their future projects. Robin swore to never trust anyone again.

Pickpocket6.title: 소매치기
Pickpocket6.desc: (미번) Orphaned and abandoned on the tumultuous streets of his polluted, teeming homeworld, NAME survived by deft hand and fleet foot. A natural born thief and trickster, HE rose to prominence early, running the notorious and violent urchin gang 'Doomben Rats'.

BusinessGangster83.title: 사업 조직폭력배
BusinessGangster83.desc: (미번) Staying one step ahead of the law, NAME became a legitimate businessman and silenced anyone who dared say otherwise. As proprietor of brothels, speakeasies and eateries, NAME's good fortune continued while his competition suffered a series of unfortunate and unexplained accidents.

DisasterSurvivor58.title: 재난 생존자
DisasterSurvivor58.desc:
(미번) Steven was uprooted when marauders attacked his family farm, destroying machinery and killing farmhands and beasts alike.
After the death of all he knew, he was left in the ruins to fend for himself.

ParamilitaryAgent3.title: 준군사조직 요원
ParamilitaryAgent3.desc: (미번) After scraping by on assorted shady jobs, NAME joined with a large paramilitary group to fight a war on HIS homeworld. HISCAP role was infiltration and intelligence gathering

HistoryStudent52.title: 역사학 학생
HistoryStudent52.desc: (미번) As a child, NAME spent learned many artistic forms including music and novel writing. As HE grew older, HE began to study legends from HIS home world - legends of the lizard-like beings at the center of HIS culture's folklore.

Storyteller68.title: 소설가
Storyteller68.desc:
(미번) NAME traveled his world recounting the legends that he had studied.
Obsessed with the legends of his people, NAME seeks someone who can help him grow scales on his skin, so he too can be as the ancients were.

NobleWard25.title: 귀족의 양자
NobleWard25.desc:
(미번) NAME was adopted by a prominent noble family after being left on their doorstep by HIS mother.
HECAP quickly learned secrets that passed between the nobles like cheap wine - of worlds beyond her own, languages, cultures and technologies both new and old.

InformationBroker88.title: 정보 브로커
InformationBroker88.desc:
(미번) NAME caught a ship to the next star system and began a life of travel and learning, quickly collecting a massive bank of knowledge from people of all shapes and sizes.
HECAP learned to sell this knowledge for great profit, and became a powerful broker of information.

FeralChild63.title: 야생의 아이
FeralChild63.desc:
(미번) Abandoned on an animal planet as a small child with nought but a blanket with a name embroidered on it, Felix made himself one with the wilderness.
When he was 13, he encountered a team of mineral surveyors, who "offered" him passage off of the planet.

VersatileWorker37.title: 다재다능한 노동자
VersatileWorker37.desc:
(미번) Spending his later teenage years in a colony of settlers, he offered what little skills he had to anyone who would take him.
Being a quick learner, he honed many of his skills and, apart from his crippling inability to understand fire, is now a fully functioning adult.

SpoiledChild32.title: 버릇없는 아이
SpoiledChild32.desc: (미번) NAME grew up the child of an industrious colony manager. In this position, most manual and dangerous tasks were forbidden by HIS parents, but on the rim everyone has to dirty their hands.

TestSubject1.title: 실험 대상
TestSubject1.desc: (미번) Kidnapped as a teenager, NAME was an unwilling test subject in experimental gene therapies for six years. Labs and scientists scare HIM.

AmateurEngineer21.title: 아마추어 기술자
AmateurEngineer21.desc: (미번) NAME grew up in a family with a military and engineering background. HECAP wanted to join the army but his father didn't like the idea, so HIS interest turned to great flying machines and works of engineering. HECAP secretly hoped that this would one day lead him to a life of galactic exploration.

AerospaceEngineer58.title: 항공우주 기술자
AerospaceEngineer58.desc: (미번) NAME was an engineer responsible for the production of aircraft and spaceships. HECAP focused on improving production lines, and was known for HIS mastery of technical and research issues.

WildChild8.title: 자연의 아이
WildChild8.desc:
(미번) NAME was abandoned on a toxic world overgrown with hostile plant life. HECAP became accustomed early to the cold burn of loneliness.
HE learned to fight, but ate his food raw and uncooked.

AlcoholicTrucker38.title: 알코올중독 트럭운전사
AlcoholicTrucker38.desc:
(미번) NAME was a space trucker working for Arcknight Industries when he killed his wife and daughter in a crash.
His body was repaired with an experimental nano-genetic therapy. Now his muscles continually regenerate and harden, and every movement tears the tissue anew. He bears the pain in silence.

HackerProdigy70.title: 해킹 영재
HackerProdigy70.desc: (미번) Wedge was raised as the only child of wealthy surgeons. After being pressured into accepting a medical apprenticeship, he snapped. He seized his inheritance and went underground to learn how to exploit computer networks. He quickly became one of the most feared hackers on his home planet.

IntelligenceAgent4.title: 정보원
IntelligenceAgent4.desc:
(미번) Because of his hacking skills, Wedge was recruited by his home planet's governing body to serve as an intelligence agent. The government trained him in combat, but he prefers psychological warfare.
Government rules proved too strict for him, so he went rogue. His current activities are unknown.

MadScientist38.title: 미친 과학자
MadScientist38.desc:
(미번) NAME grew up miserable on the plains of a neolithic planet. He found the strength to fight under the teachings of an old, broken scientist.
He quickly learned to play with people's fears, and was nicknamed 'mad scientist'.

WarChief54.title: 대족장
WarChief54.desc: (미번) NAME was a tribal gang leader on a neolithic planet. For him, the battlefield is a game, and there is nothing more fun than the fires of war.

YouthDelinquent81.title: 비행 청소년
YouthDelinquent81.desc:
(미번) NAME was the only child of celebrity sommeliers. Her parents expected her to take up the family profession, but after her third admission to a youth detention center, this career path became unlikely.
While in detention, NAME became skilled at making shanks and developed an interest in orinthology.

InvoluntaryHermit72.title: 본의 아닌 은둔자
InvoluntaryHermit72.desc: (미번) NAME’s escape pod was jettisoned onto an unexplored region of a frontier world. She eked out a lonely existence with only a herd of muffalo for company. Later, she was spotted clad in pygmy wombat furs, discussing the importance of hoof hygiene with a group of elderly muffalo.

HillbillyProdigy33.title: 두메산골 영재
HillbillyProdigy33.desc: (미번) Born on a cold hillbilly planet inhabited mainly by furred xenohumans, Benjamin grew up to the sound of bar fights and shootouts. Though his childhood was spent playing the banjo and working as a mechanic, his abnormal intelligence made him want something more; he entered medical school at age twenty.

MedicalScientist25.title: 의학 과학자
MedicalScientist25.desc: (미번) Benjamin enlisted as a doctor on a passing science vessel. Roaming the stars with a large crew of xenohumans and transbirds, he did genetic research on encountered species. He developed a deep friendship with one transbird but was forced to leave the ship when the captain dismissed all non-avians.

MidworldSketcher21.title: 중간계 화가
MidworldSketcher21.desc:
(미번) NAME was born into a loving but poor family.
HECAP discovered he had an artistic talent which he inherited from his father. HISCAP mother taught him the benefits of hard work and determination. As he grew older, NAME developed a fascination with technology and military history.

MidworldSailor20.title: 중간계 선원
MidworldSailor20.desc:
(미번) NAME joined his country's Royal Navy. After years as a non-commissioned officer, he eventually cracked and used the skills he had acquired to start a mutiny on his ship.
In the end, NAME was the leader of a large group of trained and dangerous pirates. He henceforth always had chefs to cook for him.

CoreWorldStudent4.title: 중심계 학생
CoreWorldStudent4.desc: (미번) Born a male named Alex, Alyssa didn't fit in well with the other boys. When very young, she preferred creative pursuits, such as crafting jewelry, over sports. She felt she had the wrong body. Luckily, her family and friends supported her sex reassignment; as a teen, she underwent surgery to become a female.

CoreWorldJeweler59.title: 중심계 보석세공사
CoreWorldJeweler59.desc: (미번) After Alyssa had completed all of her surgeries, she found that she had a lot of time and energy to dedicate to her passion: trinket crafting. She spent years perfecting her art as a jeweler, then left her home world to sell her wares across the galaxy.

MedievalSquire61.title: 중세 대지주
MedievalSquire61.desc: (미번) William grew up on a medieval planet as a knight in training. He trained directly under the king's war adviser for most of his youth, and learned to fight with a sword and shield.

MedievalKnight71.title: 중세 기사
MedievalKnight71.desc: (미번) William fought for king and country on the battlefield, where he further honed his skill as a swordsman. His greatest glory was leading a charge into an enemy courtroom and capturing the king at sword point.

StarSquire21.title: 별의 대지주
StarSquire21.desc:
(미번) Born on a medieval word, NAME's first memory is of gazing up into the night's sky.
Ever since, HE dreamed of squiring for a knight amidst the star-filled heavens. HISCAP focus on that vision left HIM somewhat single-minded.

StarKnight78.title: 별의 기사
StarKnight78.desc:
(미번) Abducted from his medieval homeworld, NAME later escaped his captors via an impressive display of swordsmanship.
For a moment, as he drifted in the escape pod, his childhood dream of becoming a knight among the stars felt so real. Then he crash-landed.

DrugMule2.title: 마약 운반책
DrugMule2.desc:
(미번) Raised in an orphanage, NAME turned towards the gang life at age ten.
He was exploited by the local gang as a drug mule to traffic "substance F" across rival gang territory. He took a bullet or two.

TestSubject82.title: 실험 대상
TestSubject82.desc: (미번) NAME enrolled in a scientific study that promised it could make HIM smarter. Unfortunately, the side effects were very different than he expected.HE went insane and killed a number of people before escaping his homeworld.

ArtisanFarmer56.title: 농사 장인
ArtisanFarmer56.desc: (미번) NAME grew up on a HIS family's glitterworld farm. They were one of the last farms on the planet that preferred traditional farming methods to glitterworld technology.

GeneticEngineer63.title: 유전학 기술자
GeneticEngineer63.desc:
(미번) NAME carried out HIS first genetic experiments on farm animals. HECAP soon grew to become quite skilled in all forms of genetic engineering.
A horrifying lab accident left him with a mortal fear of rodents.

Pampered62.title: 응석받이
Pampered62.desc:
(미번) Born on a decadent glitterworld, NAME was given every expensive toy.
This pampered lifestyle caused HIM to miss many basic life lessons. HECAP developed a special aversion to cooking, and always ordered the staff to do the kitchen work.

NinjaAssassin4.title: 닌자 암살자
NinjaAssassin4.desc:
(미번) NAME performed stiletto-precise assassinations for an interplanetary conglomerate. HECAP was assigned the most complex missions involving disguise, deception, subterfuge, and efficient violence.
A nasty incident with a potted plant and an assassination gone wrong left HIM with an aversion to plant life.

MilitaryChild34.title: 군대 아이
MilitaryChild34.desc:
(미번) NAME grew up in a family with a rich military background. HISCAP teenage years were spent traveling system to system wherever HIS parents were deployed.
HECAP enlisted at age 18, following the tradition of HIS family.

LazyProgrammer84.title: 게으른 프로그래머
LazyProgrammer84.desc:
(미번) NAME independently developed software that had a competitive edge against local urbworld corporations.
HISCAP legally questionable methods lead to a growing number in unsolved claims of intellectual property theft.

GangMember82.title: 조직원
GangMember82.desc:
(미번) NAME grew up homeless on an urbworld. HECAP was forced to fight and struggle for everything, making HIM hard and ruthless long before adulthood.
NAME would have stayed in those streets, had HE not been injured in a shootout and had his body confiscated for use by one of the worldwide city's ruling corporations.

MindwipedAssassin80.title: 정신개조 암살자
MindwipedAssassin80.desc:
(미번) The corporation took and remade NAME. They trained HIM into an tool of destruction and subversion. HE took to HIS new life, finding satisfaction in the jobs they sent HIM on.
When HE learned that they planned on disposing of HIM, NAME turned on his masters, killing several and fleeing the planet.

TestSubject90.title: 실험 대상
TestSubject90.desc:
(미번) Test subject #11,529,914 of experiment #56,048 spent her childhood in white rooms performing mental and physical tests.
Her only companion was a voice that called itself Mother. Mother rewarded success with praise - and failure with harsh punishment.

TestSubject6.title: 실험 대상
TestSubject6.desc:
(미번) NAME's tests went from geometry to quantum physics, and she could run the grand gauntlet without a scratch.
One day, Mother said that her final test lay beyond the red door, and that even if she couldn't hear her voice, Mother would always be there.

FireScarredChild32.title: 화상 흉터의 아이
FireScarredChild32.desc: (미번) Duster was an active child who lived an uneventful childhood until he fell into a fire and suffered horrific burns to his hands and arms. Although the scars have faded, he can't bear to be in close proximity to fire.

SpaceshipSalesman6.title: 우주선 외판원
SpaceshipSalesman6.desc: (미번) Duster tried his hand at various jobs, including building space rabbit cages and working at a mutant wheat research project. Finally, he found his true calling as a spacecraft salesman. Specializing in recreational spacecraft, his smooth talk and charming nature served him well.

TechEnthusiast65.title: 기술광
TechEnthusiast65.desc: (미번) Michael had all the latest gadgets as a child. He spent all his time playing games with AIs instead of with other children. He always felt awkward around new people.

AIProgrammer5.title: 인공지능 프로그래머
AIProgrammer5.desc:
(미번) Michael enlisted in the military's robotics division, developing smarter combat AI.
The whole time he was there, he never spoke with another human. He spent all his time conversing with the AI he was developing.

DiplomatsChild66.title: 외교관의 아이
DiplomatsChild66.desc:
(미번) NAME was born in diplomatic family.
Travelling often, HE was home-schooled and saw the world mostly through a computer.

WhiteHatHacker49.title: 선량한 해커
WhiteHatHacker49.desc: (미번) From HIS computer, NAME helped rid the online world of bad people.

Winerunner96.title: 와인 배달부
Winerunner96.desc:
(미번) Abandoned by his parents, NAME was raised by the monks of the Novo Mosteiro dos Jerónimos monastery on Aracena VI.
The monks taught him discipline and hard work. In return, HE would go into the city and 'acquire' exotic wines for the monks' nightly tastings.

VinhoKing50.title: 와인의 왕
VinhoKing50.desc:
(미번) After prohibition came to Aracena VI, NAME expanded his underground liquor business until it dominated the market on two continents. They called him the Vinho King.
Though HE mostly controlled his competition by masterful political maneuvering, HE was not above the occasional beat-down or stiletto assassination.

StreetChild49.title: 길바닥 아이
StreetChild49.desc: (미번) NAME's drug addict mother died, leaving HIM an orphan at a young age. To stay alive, HE resorted to theft, and when necessary, prostitution. When NAME was caught stealing from a church, the priestess saw a wounded but smart child, and took HIM in to give HIM a second chance at life.

SlaveChemist35.title: 노예 약사
SlaveChemist35.desc: (미번) NAME became a gifted pharmaceutical scientist, but was captured by slavers. HECAP was sold to a warlord and forced to create drugs to test on other slaves. This left HIM with deep and troubling questions on the ethics of scientific research and medicine.

SlaveFarmer49.title: 노예 농부
SlaveFarmer49.desc: (미번) Abandoned as a little girl, NAME was found by a farmer. Being infertile himself, the farmer kept her as a slave. The constant beatings left her scarred and unable to handle violence. After many years, she ran away.

RocketEngineer75.title: 로켓 기술자
RocketEngineer75.desc: (미번) NAME won a grant to a top school and earned a degree in rocket engineering. After several years working for a space mining company she left to travel and see the universe.

MedievalSlave34.title: 중세 노예
MedievalSlave34.desc: (미번) Born into slavery, Soren never knew his parents. He eventually escaped from his masters and boarded a military cargo ship, where he was pressed into military service.

SpaceMarine27.title: 우주 해병
SpaceMarine27.desc: (미번) Soren joined a squad of space marines known for their brutal efficiency at killing. His last name and his lack of emotion during combat inspired his nickname: Grim.

FoundryApprentice81.title: 수습 주물사
FoundryApprentice81.desc: (미번) NAME grew up as an apprentice in the foundries of an industrial world. This experience gave HIM metalworking skills and strong muscles, but stunted HIS artistic development.

CombatEngineer42.title: 전투 기술자
CombatEngineer42.desc: (미번) NAME became a combat engineer. HE built bases, fixed guns, and repaired vehicles for the army - when HE wasn't shooting at people, that is.

PrivilegedProdigy5.title: 금수저 영재
PrivilegedProdigy5.desc: (미번) NAME was recognized as gifted early in his glitterworld upbringing. Luckily, HIS family was in a position to cultivate that genius through advanced education. HIS training included science, leadership, and the arts.

PlanetaryDiplomat42.title: 행성 외교관
PlanetaryDiplomat42.desc: (미번) NAME's passion and profession was interplanetary politics. HE was a master of social manipulation and negotiation and devoted HIMself to working towards peace, compromise and mutual benefit.

ChildProdigy22.title: 신동
ChildProdigy22.desc: (미번) After graduating college at age twelve, Jered devoted his life to becoming immortal. However his research crossed the line when he tried to modify his body using gene therapy and mechanical augmentation. He was arrested and condemned to a prison planet.

RenegadeEngineer33.title: 탈주 기술자
RenegadeEngineer33.desc:
(미번) After a daring escape from the prison planet with a small crew of fellow inmates, Jered set his gaze on his homeworld.
He travelled there, recruited more followers, hijacked a space cruiser, and launched into the void.

BoneCollector51.title: 뼈 수집가
BoneCollector51.desc:
(미번) Born to a family of fortune hunters, NAME always had a passion for ancient history.
Though never a tough or social boy, HE loved to dig through history books as well as dirt piles.

Osteologist68.title: 골학자
Osteologist68.desc:
(미번) After graduating university at the top of his class, NAME quickly became a well-known and athletic college professor.
With his new found fame and fitness came a sudden reluctance to preform menial labor - such tasks are better left to graduate students.

GNomeSculptor81.title: 지놈 조각가
GNomeSculptor81.desc:
(미번) NAME was engineered in a lab as part of the G-nome Project. He was implanted at birth with encyclopedic knowledge of all aspects of xenobiology.
The G-nome scientists nicknamed him Gizmo and occupied him with sculpting. He developed a love of sculpting gnomes and gnome accessories.

Gnomebiologist56.title: 지놈 생물학자
Gnomebiologist56.desc:
(미번) Gizmo was a xenobiology professor in a glitterworld university. He went to conferences and managed an art gallery.
However, he never stopped sculpting yard gnomes, and considers this to be his true profession.

CircusPerformer69.title: 서커스 공연자
CircusPerformer69.desc:
(미번) Growing up in the circus, NAME learned a lot of interesting things. More interesting then the balls he juggled were the pockets he picked between shows.
A mistake with some firesticks made him develop a deathly fear of fire.

CriminalKingpin63.title: 범죄의 중심
CriminalKingpin63.desc:
(미번) NAME discovered his gift - people did what he said, when he said it. Taking advantage of this, he set off for the rimworlds planets to make a name for himself in the criminal underworld.
Having people do things for him taught him to avoid manual labor at all costs.

VatgrownSlavegirl4.title: 인공배양 무수리
VatgrownSlavegirl4.desc: (미번) Emmie was vat-grown as a slave in an illegal urbworld laboratory. As a young child, she was taught only to cook, clean and serve her masters. For most of her childhood, she knew nothing else.

UrbworldSexSlave3.title: 도시계 성 노예
UrbworldSexSlave3.desc: (미번) Emmie was sold into sexual slavery. Having been designed to be inhumanly attractive and too weak to rebel against her masters, she was passed between dozens of owners and knew nothing of freedom.

GunKid57.title: 총의 꼬마
GunKid57.desc:
(미번) Growing up in a urbworld, NAME never had it easy. Every day was a struggle and pollution, hunger, and gangs of older kids.
In the little space he had to himself, he studied his passion - guns, combat tactics, and war history.

UrbworldSergeant87.title: 도시계 경사
UrbworldSergeant87.desc:
(미번) NAME's passion for all things militaristic kept with him all the way to adulthood.
After enrolling as a local policeman, he was soon promoted to sergeant.

FeudalLordling43.title: 봉건제 소군주
FeudalLordling43.desc:
(미번) NAME grew up on a feudal world that was part of a multi-planet empire. As the son of a high lord, HE enjoyed many privileges.
HECAP learned to maneuver in the both the political landscape and in close quarters combat.

SystemLord49.title: 성계 군주
SystemLord49.desc: (미번) For NAME, ruling a country, or even a planet, was not good enough. HECAP sought to expand his influence across the system - by legal or extralegal means.

FeudalFarmBoy31.title: 봉건제 농장 아이
FeudalFarmBoy31.desc:
(미번) NAME was the son of a medieval farmer, and was expected to follow in his footsteps. He was brought up as a kind, well trained farm boy.
He lived in an unusual feudal kingdom which co-existed with a midworld society which was itself well-known for genetic manipulation.

HunterOfTheKing3.title: 왕의 사냥꾼
HunterOfTheKing3.desc:
(미번) NAME was forced to protect his colony in the name of the king after a mysterious outbreak of murderous genetically-modified wildlife.
Despite his best efforts, his kingdom was destroyed. NAME developed PTSD, a hatred of animals and a bad case of technophobia. HECAP was named for the place they found him.

SpaceFanboy24.title: 우주 덕후
SpaceFanboy24.desc: (미번) NAME dreamed of space travel. He built his own pretend spaceship from an old police box and went to see the great unknown.

Castaway19.title: 조난자
Castaway19.desc: (미번) NAME was a passenger on a routine interstellar transit. When his ship was destroyed, he lived as a castaway on an uninhabited planet for several years.

GlitterworldNerd52.title: 번화계 덕후
GlitterworldNerd52.desc:
(미번) NAME loved technology from the day HE was born. HECAP had a mechanoid companion which HE tried to modify when HE was 10.
HISCAP obsession with technology meant that HE never appreciated arts or culture.

EnergyResearcher46.title: 에너지 연구원
EnergyResearcher46.desc: (미번) NAME was working on an idea for rapid communication over long distances. HECAP made an error which destroyed HIS lab and most of the city. HECAP fled the planet to escape the authorities.

WarChild73.title: 전쟁 아이
WarChild73.desc: (미번) Mushinto's parents were drafted into a civil war in his home country. Growing up surrounded by fighting and death, he became well-accustomed to tragedy and tough as nails. His expressive side, however, never developed.

BountyHunter22.title: 현상금 사냥꾼
BountyHunter22.desc: (미번) When the civil war ended, Mushinto had to find a new way to use his fighting skills. He decided to hunt down war criminals and soon realized that he enjoyed capturing bad guys by any means necessary.

UpperUrbworlder20.title: 도시계 상류층
UpperUrbworlder20.desc: (미번) NAME had a privileged childhood on a major urbworld. Living in an apartment far above the dense poverty of the city, HE spent most of HIS time reading or drawing the cityscape he saw through HIS window.

Missionary23.title: 선교사
Missionary23.desc: (미번) NAME decided to devote HIS life to religious service. HE made a vow of peace and spent several years preaching and serving food in soup kitchens for the homeless.

IdealisticCadet35.title: 이상주의 생도
IdealisticCadet35.desc:
(미번) Raised in the military traditions of his forefathers, NAME was taught from a young age that he would be a great leader and the hero of the Dichter family.
He excelled at his studies and graduated from the academy with honors.

MercenaryPilot69.title: 용병 조종사
MercenaryPilot69.desc:
(미번) NAME convinced his squadron to abscond with their ships and make a course for the rim worlds. There they could fight for the causes they believed in.
His men were loyal and fought hard, but their ideals soon faded away and their cause became that of the highest bidder.

ChildOfGlass96.title: 온실의 아이
ChildOfGlass96.desc:
(미번) NAME was raised underground on a "marble" planet - a wasteland of radioactive asphalt and toxic fallout.
To survive on a planet devoid of life, HE had to learn how to farm underground and how to fight without wasting bullets.

LoneTraveler73.title: 고독한 여행자
LoneTraveler73.desc:
(미번) After escaping HIS homeworld on a jury-rigged ship, NAME traveled to new worlds to experience their beauty.
HECAP joined resistance groups and applied the skills HE cultivated on HIS homeworld. HECAP often warned of the nuclear horror HE saw as a child.

AmateurBotanist14.title: 아마추어 식물학자
AmateurBotanist14.desc: (미번) Spending many summers crawling through dirt, Christian found he had quite the green thumb. Instead of learning to cook the food he grew, he just grew more and more.

Undertaker50.title: 장의사
Undertaker50.desc: (미번) NAME roamed the galaxy offering grief assistance to those who've had a recent loss. While he never shied away from physical confrontation, he prefers to confront tough situations with a calm word.

ChildSlave6.title: 어린 노예
ChildSlave6.desc: (미번) Graham was born to a poor family on a rimworld. His father sold him into slavery at a young age and he was traded many times. A tycoon bought him as part of a child labor force and sent down into mines to look after machines and to work alongside them.

Mercenary75.title: 용병
Mercenary75.desc: (미번) After escaping a crew of rimworld slavers, Graham developed a lack of respect for life. He proceeded to sign on to a mercenary group where he developed skills using guns and survival techniques. Graham did dirty work where he found it, and traveled to many worlds.

AdventuringChild56.title: 모험의 아이
AdventuringChild56.desc:
(미번) Axle was raised to become an engineer. For years, he planned to stow away on a cargo ship and start a new, more adventuresome life.
One night, after his parents fell asleep, he managed to sneak on board a cargo ship just before it left port.

HiredAssassin2.title: 살인 청부업자
HiredAssassin2.desc: (미번) Axle was a master thief, working mostly for organized crime. Over time, he made a name for himself and shifted his business into the paid "removal" of human threats.

VideoGamer91.title: 비디오 게이머
VideoGamer91.desc: (미번) Ryan was raised in a glitterworld. Everything he wanted came to him. In school he was a social butterfly. At home, he spent his time looking up the newest gadgets and playing his favourite video games.

SpaceshipChef34.title: 우주선 주방장
SpaceshipChef34.desc: (미번) Ryan got a spot on a ship by becoming the ship's cook. He enjoyed cooking and helping the doctor clean wounds, but he never got used to cleaning the dishes.

DreadedBaby55.title: 염려되는 아기
DreadedBaby55.desc: (미번) NAME was found as a baby in a crashed spacecraft. According to the ship's data records, HE invented the nuclear device that powered his ship. Apparently, he also invented the sky and the hamburger, and is said to have fathered a race of tasty golden kittens.

DreadedDude3.title: 염려되는 놈
DreadedDude3.desc:
(미번) Some followers say that NAME and HIS crew of misfits found the Fountain of Youth, many, many centuries ago, and that they caused the extinction of the dinosaurs on many planets.
There's even a religion about them, somewhere, involving noodles and meatballs.

Tinkerer87.title: 땜장이
Tinkerer87.desc: (미번) NAME grew up on a scrap-heap of a planet - the garbage dump of other planets in the system. He learned to make new machines from the dead parts of old ones. With some friends, he eventually escaped on a salvaged and repaired ship.

Engineer9.title: 기술자
Engineer9.desc: (미번) NAME found a job as a tinkering engineer on the trading hub planet Irithir. Tough local traders forced him to learn negotiation skills, and he made good profits selling refurbished weapons and tools.

DisplacedNoble82.title: 추방된 귀족
DisplacedNoble82.desc: (미번) Born on an urbworld to the ruler of three megacities, NAME’s prospects looked good - until a violent insurrection overthrew HIS family. Exile introduced NAME to hard work and combat, but some high-born squeamishness remains.

Minister38.title: 장관
Minister38.desc: (미번) NAME managed to secure an important position in the government of a minor glitterworld. HECAP got used to the opulence, while attempting to keep HIS citizens content. HECAP had ample time for pleasure and indulgence – though HE never forgot how to do hard work.

ChessMaster23.title: 체스의 장인
ChessMaster23.desc:
(미번) NAME loved to play chess. HECAP even earned the nickname Bishop for some of HIS craftier moves.
HECAP never got into trouble - mostly because he was good at not getting caught.

Pirate65.title: 해적
Pirate65.desc:
(미번) As a pirate leader, Bishop was well-known for his cunning plans and chess-like traps. HECAP was never afraid to sacrifice a few pawns to capture an important target.
HISCAP name has been linked more then once to strategies that overcame overwhelming odds.

Orphan62.title: 고아
Orphan62.desc: (미번) Born on a deep space station, NAME was orphaned at a young age. In the orphanage, he stood up for the weaker kids and fought off the bullies.

BountyHunter14.title: 현상금 사냥꾼
BountyHunter14.desc: (미번) NAME is a self-employed bounty hunter. HECAP spent HIS days hunting space pirates and collecting cash bounties.

Straggler99.title: 낙오자
Straggler99.desc:
(미번) Despite being blessed with parental love, NAME hardly knew his parents.
HECAP was frequently left to his own devices which meant more time devoted to exploring his interests…and getting into trouble.

Spiceminer98.title: 향신료 광부
Spiceminer98.desc:
(미번) NAME made his mark on the universe as a spice miner assigned to the lucrative mining colony of Rural Pen’The.
Little did he know, Benn was about to embark on a career path that would change his life.

BrutalThief33.title: 잔혹한 도둑
BrutalThief33.desc:
(미번) Growing up in a gang, NAME learned the brutality of the streets.
Knowing that showing weakness could be fatal, he closed himself of to others.

CrimeLord40.title: 범죄의 제왕
CrimeLord40.desc:
(미번) Through brutality and cruelty, NAME rose to the rank of crime lord.
He relied less on his fists and more on his guns. His reputation spread faster due to his cold-bloodedness and ruthless methods.

BoySoldier18.title: 어린 군인
BoySoldier18.desc:
(미번) War may never change - but the cast of characters does.
Born on a violent urbworld, NAME was trained from a young age to fight the wars of others, and became rather good at it.

MarbleDoctor3.title: 무정한 의사
MarbleDoctor3.desc:
(미번) On a bomb-blasted world, first aid is often the only aid.
NAME used his medical skills to help the injured and the sick. HECAP believed that while guns and machines may be powerful, a doctor is even more so.

ApocalypseChild97.title: 종말의 아이
ApocalypseChild97.desc:
(미번) NAME spent his childhood on a post-apocalyptic world. He fought for survival from a young age, on a planet where trust did not exist.
He told everyone that he had no luck.

MobHenchman44.title: 조직 오른팔
