MobHenchman44.desc: (미번) After being "saved" from his home world by a slaver ship, NAME was sold to an urbworld crime lord, where he was used as a henchman. He specialized in low-tech beat-downs and intimidation.

OrphanOfWar96.title: 전쟁 고아
OrphanOfWar96.desc:
(미번) NAME lost his family and home early in life. His life became emotionally hollow, but his painful memories drove him to survive.
HECAP took several jobs, but never achieved more than a basic education.

MechWarVeteran90.title: 메카 전쟁 베테랑
MechWarVeteran90.desc: (미번) NAME fought against swarms of rogue mechanoids since he was old enough to enlist. HECAP has bled on half a dozen worlds and has lost more than he cares to recall. These experiences left him hardened, both mentally and physically.

ImperialStudent92.title: 제국 학생
ImperialStudent92.desc: (미번) NAME studied on an imperial midworld where guns were banned and self-defense study was encouraged. The relative safety allowed HIM to focus on HIS botanical research.

PoisonGardener85.title: 독 정원사
PoisonGardener85.desc:
(미번) NAME spent almost all HIS time tending to a poison garden and became withdrawn from society.
In that time HE learnt a few safe culinary and medicinal uses for the otherwise deadly plants.

PowerMadScholar58.title: 힘에 미친 학자
PowerMadScholar58.desc: (미번) "Knowledge is power." These words sparked something within NAME, and came to form his core drive. When not entombed within libraries, HE would take things apart to see first-hand how they worked, with little regard for the border between mechanical and organic.

ArtificerRampant50.title: 걷잡을 수 없는 기능공
ArtificerRampant50.desc:
(미번) Fuelled by the thrill of discovery and his own megalomania, NAME set out to invent new devices and improve existing ones, breaking laws and customs as necessary.
HECAP formed a crew to gather materials for HIS work - and to deal with outsiders who might interfere.

TechHead78.title: 기술책임자
TechHead78.desc:
(미번) Standing on the ship hull with his father in an child-size EVA suit, NAME loved space from a young age.
HECAP was put in a Civil Academics Program. While pretending to be like HIS father, HE spent HIS time taking care of plants in HIS messy room. HISCAP nickname was given for HIS love of circles.

SystemsEngineer27.title: 체계 기술자
SystemsEngineer27.desc:
(미번) Like HIS father, NAME was a systems engineer. HECAP was qualified in both colony and ship systems.
When not working, HE would make mechanical figurines, read old books, or occasionally travel to uncharted worlds. Being introverted, HE did these things mostly alone.

Orphan91.title: 고아
Orphan91.desc:
(미번) Left alone in the world without parents, Kevin did the best he could to adapt.
Having to take care both of himself and younger kids at the orphanage, he learned a lot about humans and how to interact with them.

NeuroScientist84.title: 신경 과학자
NeuroScientist84.desc:
(미번) Kevin worked for a long time to improve the world's understanding of the human brain.
After succeeding in mapping the whole brain, Kevin joined a team of scientist on a quest to map the brains of xeno species.

Abductee39.title: 유괴된 꼬마
Abductee39.desc: (미번) NAME was abducted at a young age and forced to do menial labor on a pirate ship.

PirateCaptain0.title: 해적 선장
PirateCaptain0.desc: (미번) NAME worked his way up through the ranks of a pirate ship, eventually becoming captain. He leads his crew between worlds, making a name to remember.

BlackjackPlayer50.title: 블랙잭 선수
BlackjackPlayer50.desc:
(미번) The only useful skill NAME learned from his tough military school was card counting. He amassed many enemies by cheating at casinos, becoming ever more edgy and violent as the threat of retaliation grew.
When he was finally caught, they burned half his skin off. He'll never be able to face fire or violence again.

HedgeFundManager27.title: 헤지 펀드 매니저
HedgeFundManager27.desc:
(미번) A top hedge fund manager on a teeming urbworld, NAME's portfolio grew rapidly as he charmed clients with a sweet voice and devious intent. When the deal turned out too good to be true, he was forced to flee the planet with a bounty on his head.
As he travelled the stars he found a passion in the arts, making masterpieces fit for high society customers.

AcademyStudent52.title: 사관학교 학생
AcademyStudent52.desc:
(미번) NAME went to school like a good space cadet would. He was very tall and was known for his good looks.
Though he worried more about his hairstyle than his grades, he still somehow passed the final exams.

ComputerEngineer28.title: 컴퓨터 기술자
ComputerEngineer28.desc:
(미번) Bored of his code-monkey office job and missing the glory days of the Academy, NAME saw a commercial about the frontier where "only the strong survive".
With his wife Morgan, NAME undertook a journey into the unknown.

AspiringEngineer42.title: 기술자 지망생
AspiringEngineer42.desc:
(미번) NAME had a fascination with gadgets and gizmos. HECAP took apart and put together almost anything HE could find.
HECAP got used to repairing toys brought to HIM by other children, and even fixed a few devices from HIS elders.

ExpertHandyman95.title: 전문 잡역부
ExpertHandyman95.desc: (미번) NAME worked as a traveling engineer. HECAP fixed things ranging from a simple communications array to the intricate software harness in his ship's AI meta-core. Nothing is beyond repair for HIM.

MedicalStudent18.title: 의학 학생
MedicalStudent18.desc:
(미번) NAME grew up on a glitterworld in a family of doctors and chose to maintain the tradition.
HECAP had few friends, but got along with HIS siblings very well.

MedicSoldier37.title: 간호 군인
MedicSoldier37.desc:
(미번) NAME enrolled in his planetary army as a frontline medic. He soon knew the horrors of war and was deeply marked by them.
HECAP left the military and his homeworld and began researching medicine and helping those he came across.

HighBaroness49.title: 고위 남작
HighBaroness49.desc:
(미번) NAME was born as low-ranking royalty in a large imperial family.
She was placed In charge of running her home planet from an early age, and learned important political and cultural skills in that role.

ExiledResearcher36.title: 추방된 연구원
ExiledResearcher36.desc: (미번) NAME's love of robotics was not appreciated in her technophobic empire. The High Cardinal of the system excommunicated her, and she was never allowed to return.

WorldSlider50.title: 세계구 범죄자
WorldSlider50.desc: (미번) NAME was raised by a world-hopping band of criminals. HECAP learned not to leave evidence of his presence in case the group had to leave in a hurry. HECAP also learned about medicine and hand-to-hand combat from his fellow criminals.

Villain66.title: 악당
Villain66.desc: (미번) After rising to the top of his criminal band, NAME was taught the arts of villainy, from handling firearms to developing new weapons technologies. He excelled at bending others to his will.

MedicalStudent71.title: 의학 학생
MedicalStudent71.desc: (미번) Born into a long line of doctors, NAME was tutored in all fields of medicine, from herbal ointments to the modern synthetic drugs. HECAP also picked up a healthy disdain for lower class work.

SpaceNavyDoctor40.title: 우주 해군 의사
SpaceNavyDoctor40.desc: (미번) NAME served several tours as a doctor on one of the few warships defending HIS homeworld. HECAP learned combat skills while fighting occasional pirate boarding parties, and became an expert at treating gruesome combat wounds.

AspergersRebel96.title: 아스퍼거 반군
AspergersRebel96.desc:
(미번) NAME grew up as a rebel on an formerly-advanced rimworld devastated by war.
HISCAP Aspergers syndrome meant he struggled with social situations and was incapable of caring, but HE learned hard skills like research and shooting very quickly.

GovernmentAgent80.title: 정부 요원
GovernmentAgent80.desc:
(미번) NAME worked for the government against rebel groups and excelled in this capacity. During HIS training HE was taught firearms, melee combat and medical skills.
Having grown up in a war-ravaged city, dirt, blood and dead bodies don’t bother HIM and HE sees no reason to clean them up.

ShootingComa31.title: 사격의 혼수상태
ShootingComa31.desc: (미번) Nebulys fell into a coma at a young age and spent years dreaming about shooting. When he awoke, he was useless at most tasks - but he could aim pretty well.

SelflessHunter57.title: 이타적인 사냥꾼
SelflessHunter57.desc:
(미번) Nebulys was a hunter of mysterious creatures that many didn't even believe existed. Sometimes the people were right - and sometimes they were wrong.
Along the way, he helped people in need.

PsychologyStudent88.title: 심리학 학생
PsychologyStudent88.desc:
(미번) NAME researched new religions and traditions and often dreamt of distant stars.
His dreams prompted him to ask what lay beyond the lights in the sky.

AcolyteOfStars66.title: 별의 시종
AcolyteOfStars66.desc:
(미번) Ever the dreamer, NAME traveled across the universe to find the thing he felt was calling to him.
HECAP became poorer and poorer, but used every means possible to carry on.

SpaceSmuggler10.title: 우주 밀수업자
SpaceSmuggler10.desc:
(미번) Tater's parents used him to help smuggle contraband between a cluster of rim worlds.
Aided by his small size, Tater became very adept at carrying out his parents' missions, learning weaponry, negotiations, and most of all smuggling.

SpaceRaider65.title: 우주 침략자
SpaceRaider65.desc: (미번) Tater was the leader of a spaceborne pirate crew. Skipping between the rim worlds, he became the feared enemy of many settlements.

Abductee2.title: 유괴된 꼬마
Abductee2.desc:
(미번) NAME was abducted by xenohumans when HE was still a baby. They experimented on HIM to understand his genetic structure.
As HE grew up, NAME grew a little bit too big and strong for his captors and eventually escaped.

Spy40.title: 첩보원
Spy40.desc: (미번) NAME was trained by HIS government in infiltration and espionage. HECAP learned to keep a cool head and to talk HIS way out of tight situations. When talking didn't work, HE was capable of more violent direct action.

BlessedChild86.title: 축복받은 아이
BlessedChild86.desc:
(미번) NAME was born under auspicious circumstances to a midworld spiritual group and held in reverence throughout HIS childhood.
HECAP learned to take care of the poor and give succor to the faithful from an early age.

WanderingHealer6.title: 방랑하는 치유사
WanderingHealer6.desc:
(미번) NAME studied to be a doctor, but was dissatisfied with HIS practice on an otherwise peaceful midworld.
Instead, HE chose to pull up roots and travel to the rimworlds in order to care for people who needed HIM most.

YouthSoldier99.title: 어린 군인
YouthSoldier99.desc:
(미번) NAME was born into a long line of soldiers. He followed that heritage, joining a military training program.
He excelled in all physical training programs in his Marine course, and even passed most of the intellectual exams. While he was never particularly bright or nimble, NAME learned the value of hard work and suffering.

VeteranSoldier2.title: 베테랑 군인
VeteranSoldier2.desc:
(미번) NAME fought many tours against pirates, rebels, and xenos. He endured the glory and horrors of war.
Worn down by drills, wars, and battle scars, NAME 'retired' to the easy soldier life of colonial civility enforcement. He spent his days polishing his war medals, knowing he had done his bloodline proud.

GlitterworldKid84.title: 번화계 꼬마
GlitterworldKid84.desc:
(미번) The son of a genetically-engineered "perfect mate" on a glitterworld, Chaz was much more shy, withdrawn and nervous than his parents. HECAP kept mostly to himself, studying science and medicine and taking on gardening as a hobby.
In HIS teens, HE ran away from home, seeking a quieter life.

CosmeticReject89.title: 화장품 거부자
CosmeticReject89.desc:
(미번) Living on the streets, Chaz submitted himself to an unethical cosmetics lab in exchange for food and shelter.
After some painful cosmetic modification, Chaz barely resembles his former self. Having been forced to work for the lab until he was rescued, Chaz is now too afraid to lash out at anyone.

FeralChild73.title: 야생의 아이
FeralChild73.desc:
(미번) NAME and his family lived a hard but prosperous lives along with their fellow colonists on a distant rimworld.
One day a group of mechanoids attacked, killing everyone aside from Robert. He then lived alone in the desert until a group of raiders found him.

RaiderKing70.title: 침략 왕
RaiderKing70.desc: (미번) Starting as nothing more than a slave, NAME rose quickly among the raider ranks until all knew his name and his ruthlessness.

Scout86.title: 정찰병
Scout86.desc:
(미번) Nate loved being outdoors. His parents enrolled him in a program that taught military scouting skills. He thrived when he was left alone in the wilderness.
Due to this upbringing, however, NAME did not learn the basic technological skills that are taken for granted by many others.

FrontierMarshal75.title: 국경 보안관
FrontierMarshal75.desc:
(미번) Nate was the marshal of his colony. He tried to honorably uphold the law, but the corrupt local mayor killed his family and left him for dead.
After regaining his health, Nate arrested the mayor. HECAP left his homeworld and started a new life working to make a difference in the universe.

TraineeAlchemist98.title: 수습 연금술사
TraineeAlchemist98.desc: (미번) NAME grew up on a medieval world. He learned the basics of alchemy and medicine in one the few monastic schools on his planet.

ReligiousHierarch42.title: 종교 고관
ReligiousHierarch42.desc:
(미번) Ordained as a priest in his local community, NAME used intrigue and diplomacy to rise to the higher echelon of the clergy. He held numerous titles and lands.
One day, a merchant landed his spaceship near NAME's home. HECAP decided to accompany the merchant in search for new worlds and challenges.

Pickpocket96.title: 소매치기
Pickpocket96.desc: (미번) NAME witnessed HIS parents' murder at a young age. With no guidance, HE had to fend for HIMself any way possible. Joining a small group of misfits HE did whatever was necessary to survive.

CriminalSurgeon8.title: 범죄의 외과의
CriminalSurgeon8.desc:
(미번) Being near many injured fellow criminals, NAME took it upon HIMself to work on them.
Although many people died, HE did get better at using knives.

SpaceCadet12.title: 우주 생도
SpaceCadet12.desc:
(미번) Growing up on a rural farm-world leaves little opportunity for excitement and adventure, so when the Royal Fleet began a recruiting program on his home planet, Jake threw down his hoe and cattle prod to took up arms for the crown.
He served on the interplanetary super-destroyer HMS Thunder-Child.

SanitationCaptain28.title: 관리소장
SanitationCaptain28.desc:
(미번) After graduating officer training school, Jake was assigned to main battle deck on the Thunder-Child. He served there for a year before his "gallant" actions saw him reassigned to the maintenance corps.
It was with the maintenance corps he was dubbed Table on account of his legs.

Naturalist25.title: 박제사
Naturalist25.desc:
(미번) Mitch grew up on a backwater planet with minimal education. He had to hunt and grow food to survive.
HISCAP family's home was frequently raided for food by scavengers. This made Mitch very suspicious and slow to trust anyone he doesn't know.

OverwatchSniper73.title: 엄호 저격수
OverwatchSniper73.desc:
(미번) NAME didn't know why he joined the military, but he stayed to protect his fellow soldiers.
Army life broke him down and built him back up. It taught him marksmanship, hand to hand combat and how to patch a bullet wound in a hurry.

Drudge47.title: 잉여
Drudge47.desc:
(미번) NAME was never sure what HE wanted to do with HIS life. HECAP spent most of HIS time doing low-wage jobs and wondering what HIS future would be like.
HECAP entertained himself with space sims and survival games, dreaming of one day being somewhere more interesting.

GalacticSightseer55.title: 은하계 관광객
GalacticSightseer55.desc:
(미번) NAME traveled the stars. HECAP could barely scrape together travel costs doing odd-jobs on stations, but it was all worth it. Seeing the wonders of the galaxy was where HE found HIS calling.
HECAP loved camping on exotic worlds and learning the patterns of strange wildlife. The wonders of the universe inspired HIM like nothing else could.

ChildOfDrifters15.title: 유랑자의 아이
ChildOfDrifters15.desc: (미번) Ever since HE was very small, NAME had never known a home beyond HIS parent's ship. They were a family of nomads whose meandering provided a constant change of scenery. HISCAP life was often perilous but never dull, and HE inherited HIS parents' wanderlust at a young age.

WanderingCrafter28.title: 방랑하는 제작자
WanderingCrafter28.desc: (미번) NAME continued to follow HIS parents' nomadic ways, supporting himself with his crafting skills. But wandering is a hard life, and HE often thought of finding somewhere to settle down and put HIS skills to good use.

TribalThunderer25.title: 부족의 수호자
TribalThunderer25.desc: (미번) Years ago, NAME's tribe stumbled upon an abandoned gun vault. Believing the weapons to be sacred gifts, the shaman would select a child born under superstitious circumstances and assign them the honour of bearing one to defend the village. NAME is such a child.

MutinousCaptain49.title: 반란의 선장
MutinousCaptain49.desc:
(미번) NAME was taken to the stars by slavers after HIS tribe was decimated in a raid. Over the years HE learned the language of HIS captors, eventually working for them as an interpreter and diplomat.
The captain only learned of NAME's true cunning when revenge was taken by form of mutiny.

CorpBredStudent62.title: 승계 수업생
CorpBredStudent62.desc:
(미번) NAME was bred to become an executive for the space exploration corporation that owned his home planet. HISCAP family had been working for that corporation for four generations.
At age five, HE enrolled at the corporate academy where he learned loyalty and ruthlessness. NAME excelled in finding diplomatic solutions where others would need violence.

CorpResearcher37.title: 회사 연구원
CorpResearcher37.desc: (미번) NAME was a leading researcher for a massive space exploration corporation.

EarthColonist29.title: 지구 개척자
EarthColonist29.desc: (미번) NAME was born on Earth. As a child, HECAP was launched into space as part of an interstellar colonization program.

SoleSurvivor46.title: 유일한 생존자
SoleSurvivor46.desc: (미번) NAME lived in a remote colony. When mechanoid centipedes attacked his home and killed his people, he was the last survivor.

MilitaryTrainee74.title: 군대 훈련생
MilitaryTrainee74.desc: (미번) NAME was raised on a military base in the Xennoa system. HECAP was exposed to many different strenuous activities and grew strong at an early age. HECAP also learned negotiation, medical, and military tactics.

AWOLSoldier46.title: 탈영병
AWOLSoldier46.desc:
(미번) NAME was an infantryman.
When HECAP was informed of his assignment to the Xennoa-Zartza War, HECAP decided he did not want to be a soldier. He was able to escape via military spacejet.

Bookworm75.title: 책벌레
Bookworm75.desc: (미번) NAME spent his youth in the library, reading every book he could about the technical marvels of space travel, the engineering ingenuity of the space-faring pioneers, and the horrible yet fascinating tales of the mechanoid races. He vowed that one day, he would see these things for himself.

Explorer36.title: 탐험가
Explorer36.desc: (미번) NAME traveled from planet to planet, gathering samples, stories, and research. He hoped one day to compile a record of every animal, plant, mineral, and machine and device in known space: The Complete Traveler's Guide to the RimWorlds.

ColonyKid89.title: 식민지 꼬마
ColonyKid89.desc:
(미번) NAME was born the child of two doctors in a small colony. Because of HIS parents, HE was always interested in science and medicine.
NAME never really got along with other children, and as a result became withdrawn and unsociable.

StarshipDoctor78.title: 우주선 의사
StarshipDoctor78.desc: (미번) NAME was a doctor on a starship. He was a brilliant surgeon and dabbled in research of his own. However, he was quite reclusive and never had the best bedside manner.

CaravanChild53.title: 행상단 아이
CaravanChild53.desc:
(미번) NAME was born on a urbworld merchant ship to an entrepreneurial mother and an absent father. Born male, she disliked boy stuff, and got into her mother’s things all the time.
Eventually, she traveled with her mother to a glitterworld and spent her savings on a body she was happy with.

BountyHunter28.title: 현상금 사냥꾼
BountyHunter28.desc: (미번) NAME was a bounty hunter on a massive glitterworld. HECAP worked sensitive assignments for extremely wealthy clients, and was known for quiet execution and total discretion.

ReEducatedYouth32.title: 재교육된 청소년
ReEducatedYouth32.desc:
(미번) NAME lived on a midworld where the government cared about the youth.
HECAP was one of the many children who were taken from their parents and forced into the new education programs.

FallenOfficial88.title: 타란한 관리
FallenOfficial88.desc:
(미번) NAME was an official for an autocratic government.
When HIS superiors demanded HE participate in atrocities, NAME resigned and escape from his homeworld with nothing but the clothes on HIS back.

FarmMechanic40.title: 농장 정비공
FarmMechanic40.desc: (미번) Growing up on a farming planet, NAME spent HIS time learning about the automated machinery that grew and harvested the multitude of crops.

OrbitalReservist59.title: 궤도 예비군
OrbitalReservist59.desc:
(미번) When the government declared that it would strengthen its military defenses, NAME was drafted and trained.
HECAP was stationed on an orbital base, manning the defense systems and, in dire situations, descending in a dropship to the surface.

AccursedChild43.title: 저주받은 아이
AccursedChild43.desc:
(미번) NAME was born at the peak of a lunar eclipse. The elders declared HIM a child of darkness brought HIM under their care.
HISCAP entire childhood was spent studying the lore and rituals of HIS people - until the day of calling.

ShamanOfShadows30.title: 그림자의 주술사
ShamanOfShadows30.desc:
(미번) When the monsters of fire came from the sky, NAME was called upon by HIS tribe to guide them into battle.
NAME made use of medicines and rituals to inspire and lead the warriors of many tribes against the invaders. The pirates were forced to retreat without capturing a single slave.

AmateurAstronomer76.title: 아마추어 천문학자
AmateurAstronomer76.desc:
(미번) NAME was fascinated with astronomy. HECAP would spend hours gazing at planets and nebulae through his telescope.
HECAP is credited with discovering a small comet that would, years later, strike a nearby moon and disrupt the mining operations there.

StationSecurity1.title: 정거장 경비원
StationSecurity1.desc:
(미번) NAME was commissioned as a special constable on a network of space stations. There he prevented illegal human trafficking.
Once, fire broke out on the station, and HE saved many from the flames. Since then, HE has avoided fires.

FarmHand94.title: 농장 일꾼
FarmHand94.desc:
(미번) NAME was born on a farm on a smaller colony world.
Everything was taken care of by the few members of the farm, including NAME. This helped HIM build independence, spirit, and a well-rounded character.

SpaceTrafficker87.title: 우주 밀매상
SpaceTrafficker87.desc:
(미번) NAME discovered HE was heir of HIS distant uncle's weapons-trading business.
To protect the future of the company HE went through extensive military training, in case of any "unforeseen circumstances".

EnergeticPopIdol4.title: 활동적인 아이돌
EnergeticPopIdol4.desc:
(미번) Priscilla grew up on a glitterworld, training in rapier arts and singing. She spent several years as an energetic teen pop idol.
However, she decided that the music and modeling industries were not paying her enough attention, so she left.

PopIdolPirate25.title: 아이돌 해적
PopIdolPirate25.desc:
(미번) NAME and her fans set out as a space pirate crew. She raided corporations for money and staged performances to spread her name.
NAME became afraid of fire when a rival burned her stage down. She relied on her fans to do the work she found unappealing.

IcePlanetChild56.title: 얼음 행성 아이
IcePlanetChild56.desc:
(미번) Growing up on the frozen wastes of an ocean moon, NAME only had animals and a few hard-bitten sailors as companions.
The lack of social interaction made him develop a interest in engineering - but he never developed any great fondness for humans.

Roboticist87.title: 로봇 기술자
Roboticist87.desc:
(미번) Sailors often died on the dangerous waters of NAME's ocean planet. HECAP created robots to replace them.
Over time, he collected a small crew of robots to do his bidding. HECAP became proficient at mechanics and engineering, but lost the taste for manual labor.

ToxicChild59.title: 중독된 아이
ToxicChild59.desc:
(미번) Growing up on a an Industrial planet, NAME started working in a chemical plant at age of six. Years of exposure to industrial toxins left him mentally scarred.
He eventually blew up the facility and escaped the planet in a stolen cargo ship.

StalwartFarmer91.title: 충실한 농부
StalwartFarmer91.desc:
(미번) With the farm under constant threat from brigands, NAME learned to defend himself with his father's rifle. HECAP also mastered how to construct walls to keep livestock in and predators out.
He once tried to paint a picture of his home, but discovered that he could only draw scribbles and ducks.

Squire51.title: 대지주
Squire51.desc:
(미번) Born to a noble family on a medieval world, NAME became a squire. HISCAP training involved falconry, fencing, and wrestling - often done wearing armor.
In battle, HIS job was to ensure that the knights were taken care of and their armor was well-polished.

Knight23.title: 기사
Knight23.desc:
(미번) When NAME came of age, HE was given a sword blessed by a high priest.
HISCAP determination and focus in battle established HIM as a knight. Throughout HIS time, HIS stories were recounted in art and folklore. Out of humility, HE never told the stories himself.

BoyScout19.title: 보이 스카우트
BoyScout19.desc:
(미번) NAME was in a boy scout troop on a midworld.
He learned many survival skills including how to thrive in the outdoors and how to tend to basic wounds.

UrbworldPimp46.title: 도시계 포주
UrbworldPimp46.desc: 처음에 NAME(은)는 약을 팔아서 작은 이익을 좀 봤습니다. 그리고 HE 여자를 팔아 부를 쌓았습니다. HE 특이하게 두 주먹으로 훌륭한 기술을 배웠습니다. 여자들을 때리며 괴롭힌 덕에 상처를 치료하는 법을 배우게 되었습니다.

ScienceProdigy96.title: 과학 영재
ScienceProdigy96.desc: NAME(은)는 학교에서 화학, 물리학, 우주 생물학, 천문학, 오페라까지 최고의 성적을 냈습니다. 다만 불행하게도 과학 실험 중 사고로 인해 불을 무서워하게 되었습니다.

ParticlePhysicist6.title: 입자 물리학자
ParticlePhysicist6.desc: NAME(은)는 최첨단 물리학 연구를 하였습니다. 그녀는 더욱 아름답고 평화로운 미래를 꿈꿔왔습니다.

DefenseLawyer2.title: 피고측 변호사
DefenseLawyer2.desc: NAME(은)는 총보다 빠른 말솜씨로 돈을 버는 재능이 있었습니다. 일자리를 찾을 때도 HIS 언변은 유용했고, 결국 법조계로 전환했습니다. HE 종종 동네 친구들을 보호하기 위해 초고속 레이서들을 변호했습니다.

SpeederRacer68.title: 초고속 레이서
SpeederRacer68.desc: NAME(은)는 칼데리아에 있는 숲에서 양치 식물을 키우는 농부의 아들로 태어났습니다. HE 대형 캐너피와 화려한 풍경 사이를 초고속으로 가로지르는 레이싱에 깊은 흥미를 느꼈습니다. 이 지하세계의 경주 덕택에 빠르게 말을 하거나 총을 쓰는 방법을 배웠습니다.

MercenaryRecruit61.title: 용병 신입
MercenaryRecruit61.desc:
외지의 용병집단에서 태어난 NAME(은)는 상당히 정신없는 무역 허브에서 자랐습니다.
결국 HECAP가 젊은 나이일 때 용병단원에 가담했습니다.

Ranger8.title: 레인저
Ranger8.desc:
NAME(은)는 숲 속 깊은 곳에서 혼자 자랐습니다.
HE 야생에서 밀렵꾼에게 대항하여 몸을 지켰고, 바깥의 도움 없이도 필요한 물자를 스스로 조달할 수 있게 되었습니다.

YoungPsychologist60.title: 어린 심리학자
YoungPsychologist60.desc:
NAME(은)는 가난한 중간계에서 태어나고 자랐습니다. HIS 어머니가 소유하고 있던 택시의 조수석에 있곤 했습니다.
지나다니는 사람을 보고 택시 승객의 잡담을 하루종일 듣다 보니 HE 누군가의 진짜 의도를 알아차리는 재능이 생겼습니다.

FactionLeader69.title: 조직 두목
FactionLeader69.desc:
(미번) HECAP가 어른이 되기 전에 NAME은(는) 범죄 소굴에 있었습니다.
그냥 재미로 그 자들을 죽음으로 몰아넣게 만들자 HE 리더십에 대한 야망과 함께 재능이 있다는 것을 깨달았습니다.

LabGrownChild20.title: 실험실에서 자란 아이
LabGrownChild20.desc:
NAME(은)는 새로운 인류를 만들기 위한 욕심에 실험실에서 태어났지만 결국 그 프로젝트는 실패하고 말았습니다.
HISCAP 어린시절은 무수한 서적과 1:1 주입식 교육 뿐이었습니다. 그는 인간의 진정한 본성에 어색함을 느끼고, 부끄러웠으며 불편했습니다.

CorpResearcher9.title: 회사 연구원
CorpResearcher9.desc:
NAME(은)는 과학 연구를 하는 일노예로써 한 기업에 팔려나갔습니다.
그는 직장에서 사회적으로 적응을 할 수 없었기에 일에만 매달렸고, 그것은 승진으로 이어질 수 없었습니다. 매일 그는 혼자서 일하고 싶었습니다.

TechScholar7.title: 기술 학자
TechScholar7.desc:
NAME(은)는 전 세계의 과학과 기술에 관여하는 젊은 학자였습니다.
HECAP는 매일 매일 자신의 지식을 갈고닦기위해 노력했습니다.

TechnologyDoctor90.title: 기술 박사
TechnologyDoctor90.desc:
NAME(은)는 추진 연료와 에너지 생성에 대한 연구를 진행했습니다.
HECAP는 기술 연구를 정말 좋아했고, 이를 통해 인간의 삶이 더욱 윤택해지길 소망했습니다.

PitGladiator18.title: 투기장 검투사
PitGladiator18.desc: NAME(은)는 어린 시절부터 지하 세계의 투기장에서 괴물이나 다른 사람들과 싸우도록 키워진 노예였습니다. HECAP는 스포츠에 타고남을 보여줬기에 마침내 자유를 쟁취할 수 있게 되었습니다. 하지만 많은 경험에도 불구하고 그 구덩이에 있으면서 지적인 경험은 전혀 만나볼 수 없었습니다.

PirateTrooper88.title: 해적 병사
PirateTrooper88.desc: NAME(은)는 유명한 성간 범죄조직에 들어갔습니다. 그 다음 그는 우주선 강탈 작전에서 충격침투조의 일원으로 활동하곤 했습니다. 그의 전투 경험이 훌륭한 전사로 만들어 줬음에도 불구하고, 무자비했던 이 직업은 결국 다른 사람이 그를 보기에 차갑고 냉담한 사람으로 보이게끔 만들어 버렸습니다.

FactoryWorker58.title: 공장 노동자
FactoryWorker58.desc:
NAME(은)는 산업계의 도시에 있는 거대한 공장에서 자랐습니다.
그는 겉잡을 수 없는 식량난과 빈곤 속에서 임금을 얻기 위해 일했습니다. 그에겐 쉬운 생활이 아니었지만 NAME(은)는 힘든 하루 일을 절대로 쉬는 일이 없었습니다.

CombatMedic16.title: 전투 간호병
CombatMedic16.desc:
그의 고향이 어마어마한 전쟁에 휘말린 이후 NAME(은)는 군의 전투 간호병으로 징집되었습니다.
몇 년동안을 참호속에서 동료 병사를 살려내려 했고, 그것은 응급치료 감각을 잘 발달시키게 해주었습니다. 또한 그는 친구들을 잃어가면서 금욕과 금주 생활이 몸에 베이게 되었습니다.

RichBoy51.title: 부유한 아이
RichBoy51.desc: NAME(은)는 중세계에서 부모님의 사랑을 받고 자랐습니다. 귀여운 애완동물과 많은 돈과 함께 말이죠. 그러나 친구는 없었습니다. HECAP는 항상 아버지에게 이렇게 말하곤 했습니다. '저 농부들은 아버지께 돈만 달라는 말 밖에 못하네요.' 그래서 그는 대부분의 시간을 혼자 보냈습니다. 그렇지 않은 시간엔 다른 꼬마들과 싸움을 벌이곤 했죠.

HiredGun99.title: 청부업자
HiredGun99.desc:
(미번) NAME always wanted to prove HE could make a living without HIS parents' help. HECAP did shady jobs that often involved pointing guns at innocent people.
He eventually made enough money to board a cheap freighter. He discovered why it was so cheap when it crashed.

Athlete75.title: 운동선수
Athlete75.desc:
(미번) NAME was professional athlete at early age. Thanks to her skills, she was able to leave her homeworld and enroll in a glitterworld university of science and technology.
Because of her demanding schedule and introverted nature, she became socially inept.

StilettoAssassin10.title: 단검 암살자
StilettoAssassin10.desc:
(미번) Because of her skills, NAME developed a sense of superiority. In time, she lost her sense of empathy. She often got into fights, and discovered how easy it is to kill a person.
After realizing her talents, she became one of the most efficient assassins in the system.

SoleSurvivor99.title: 유일한 생존자
SoleSurvivor99.desc:
(미번) Hawke's entire tribe was wiped out by a mysterious disease.
Found alone and adopted by another band, he never became close with the other tribe members. He preferred to stay away from his new home, wandering the woods and tending the animals.

Hunter7.title: 사냥꾼
Hunter7.desc:
(미번) Hawke was a master hunter.
He learned to track and trap any animal in the most dangerous of places, and had deep knowledge of many ingenious methods for taking down specific large animals.

MechanoidHacker35.title: 메카노이드 해커
MechanoidHacker35.desc:
(미번) The only son of a well respected mechanoid inventor, NAME had access to the materials to subvert and modify HISCAP father's creations.
HECAP used drugs to increase HIS productivity. Unfortunately, the side-effects included persistent delusions of being mechanized, which limited HIS social life.

BattlefieldTech63.title: 전장의 기술자
BattlefieldTech63.desc:
(미번) NAME had received firearms training, but HIS work was focused on technical adaption and manipulation of combat mechanoids on the battlefield.
HECAP developed PTSD after narrowly escaping a primitive firebomb attack in a wheat field. The army medically discharged him from service.

ProjectSubject48.title: 프로젝트 피실험자
ProjectSubject48.desc:
(미번) NAME was picked by government agents for the mysterious "Frame Project".
Due to memory blockages, however, he remembers very little about this project or its true agenda - only that there were few survivors.

MasterTrader3.title: 상업 장인
MasterTrader3.desc: (미번) NAME was a master at trading. HECAP earned his nickname by helping a village through a trying time.

HexCellArtist19.title: 헥스셀 예술가
HexCellArtist19.desc:
(미번) NAME crafted sculptures from spent hex-cells and traded them to a local museum for food.
After HIS popularity grew, HE was approached by a pirate and abducted. The pirate kept HIM prisoner and forced HIM to create sculptures for sale.

ExoticChef84.title: 이국적인 주방장
ExoticChef84.desc:
(미번) NAME has always gone overboard when it comes to food. HECAP is always seeking new and exotic ingredients.
HISCAP quest for ingredients has brought HIM into some close calls with local flora and fauna.

PlagueProdigy12.title: 전염병 영재
PlagueProdigy12.desc:
(미번) NAME's childhood was cut short when a mysterious plague hit his homeworld.
HECAP watched his friends die, and his compassion for humanity died with them. In its place a new thirst for knowledge emerged.

MadScientist79.title: 미친 과학자
MadScientist79.desc:
(미번) NAME's lust for knowledge was only matched by his disdain for anyone who would stand in the way of his research.
Traveling from world to world, he sought answers to questions few dared to ask.

Dreamer11.title: 몽상가
Dreamer11.desc:
(미번) NAME was an expressive child. HECAP sang often, and made friends very easily, be they young or old, male or female.
HECAP hated fighting, but when made angry, HE could be dangerous. HISCAP temper was quick.

SpaceExplorer81.title: 우주 탐험가
SpaceExplorer81.desc:
(미번) NAME once spent ten years trapped, alone on an alien planet. HECAP quickly adapted to the local environment, and learned to communicate with HIS local enemies.
This long period alone left him without close friends. HISCAP heart is sensitive, but he learned to hide HIS emotions very well.

UrbworldUrchin13.title: 도시계 부랑아
UrbworldUrchin13.desc:
(미번) Meredith was born in the darkest slums of her urban homeworld. Neglected by her mother, she learned to survive on her own, battling for every scrap of food she saw.
Eventually, as her talents exceeded her peers, she ascended from the depths to the surface streets and left her mother behind.

Smuggler62.title: 밀수업자
Smuggler62.desc:
(미번) As a contract pilot, Meredith had a knack for stealing goods and trafficking contraband without getting caught.
She eventually saved up enough to buy her own ship, and used it to travel from world to world dealing her goods in person.

MilitaryRecruit62.title: 군대 신병
MilitaryRecruit62.desc:
(미번) NAME was born on a midworld run by an intensely militaristic dictatorship.
From a young age, HE was trained to be a good soldier. They taught him how to use a gun and how to fight with melee weapons.

DestroyerGeneral40.title: 구축함 장군
DestroyerGeneral40.desc:
(미번) NAME held the rank of Destroyer-General in a powerful midworld military.
HECAP was known for his mastery of weapons, and was also a good ship pilot.

StreetUrchin51.title: 길바닥 부랑아
StreetUrchin51.desc:
(미번) Born to a poor family on an urbworld, NAME was abandoned on the streets at a young age.
He learned to steal and kill to survive the ruthless streets, gaining skills in melee and ranged combat. There was little time for talk in his life.

SerialMurderer52.title: 연쇄 살인범
SerialMurderer52.desc:
(미번) NAME started to enjoy killing people, so he did more often and perfected his methods. He lurked in the darkest streets, stalking prey for hours.
He enjoyed making artworks of his victims, and was known for leaving his signature on the bodies of those he killed.

MedievalThief74.title: 중세 도둑
MedievalThief74.desc:
(미번) NAME grew up poor and hungry on a medieval planet, learning to fend for himself.
At first, he only took what he needed. Then he learned to take what he wanted.

HumanTrafficker69.title: 인신 매매상
HumanTrafficker69.desc:
(미번) NAME stole children from their homes to sell them to interested buyers.
Over time, he lost what little moral sense he had left.

TraumatizedYouth62.title: 충격받은 청소년
TraumatizedYouth62.desc:
(미번) NAME lived on a pleasant midworld.
HISCAP prosthophobe mother fell sick with heart disease. In desperation, NAME's father abducted innocent people and harvested their hearts. NAME's father was arrested, but the child remained scarred from the experience.

MentalPatient64.title: 정신병 환자
MentalPatient64.desc:
(미번) NAME was placed in a psychiatric hospital. There, HE spent HIS time engaged in the calming activities of the asylum.
HECAP was eventually released, but HE retained HIS emotional distance, HIS curiosity about human anatomy, and HIS namesake manic giggling.

GalacticPage15.title: 은하계 시종
GalacticPage15.desc:
(미번) NAME served the high admiral of a space fleet. HECAP learned the ways of court, including etiquette and speechcraft.
In his feudal society, it was considered a great honor to serve a man of such prestige.

EnvoyOfTheStars91.title: 별의 특사
EnvoyOfTheStars91.desc:
(미번) NAME entered the diplomatic corps. Honor and tradition were the values he took with him on every mission.
HISCAP prestigious position distanced him from backbreaking manual labor, allowing HIM to focus on his wordsmithing abilities. He left the blacksmithing to others.

ApprenticeSmith9.title: 수습 대장장이
ApprenticeSmith9.desc:
(미번) NAME grew up helping in his father's smithy.
They were some of the last smiths on the planet that to use traditional smithing methods. They even collect some materials themselves.
Sometimes, after work, NAME would practice using the swords HE forged.

Blacksmith32.title: 대장장이
Blacksmith32.desc: (미번) As a blacksmith on a medieval world, NAME gained a reputation for the high quality of HIS work. HECAP wasn't bad at using the swords HE forged either.

CloneFarmed43.title: 복제 인간
CloneFarmed43.desc: (미번) Clone children are seeded into organic-rich wombvats and rapidly grown in a simmed universe. They're harvested later, sometimes for food, sometimes for organs, sometimes for workers - but they're always called 'Disposable'.

CloneFarmer72.title: 복제 농부
CloneFarmer72.desc: (미번) Harvesting the products of clone farms is mostly done by the clones themselves -particularly to those whose sims tended towards the social. This clone was one such, who escaped from the farms and headed out to the stars.

GangMember12.title: 조직원
GangMember12.desc:
(미번) NAME grew up without parents. HISCAP whole life was spent alone, fighting for survival on the streets.
No matter how hard it became to survive, he never gave up.

GangBoss0.title: 조직 두목
GangBoss0.desc:
(미번) To survive, NAME's gang often had to rob interstellar traders for food and supplies. Sometimes he had to kill the guards. Sometimes he had to kill the police who arrived to stop him.
After years of this, he became one of the most-wanted criminals in the local stellar empire.

MilitantChild30.title: 전투적인 아이
MilitantChild30.desc:
(미번) NAME's military family forced him to train in hand-to-hand combat and fighting tactics.
In his own time, he built small inventions. This sharpened his mind.

LostMarine68.title: 사라진 해병
LostMarine68.desc:
(미번) Shortly after being promoted to a respected position in his planet's military, NAME disappeared without a trace.
Later, he reappeared at the head of his own military force. No one knows why he became who he was.

Killer70.title: 살인자
Killer70.desc:
(미번) NAME was a bloodlusting child. Villagers thought her the product of a snake demon and human coupling.
After watching how her human father betrayed and murdered her mother, she longed to see how many more humans she could get to fall into her hands.

Healer46.title: 치유사
Healer46.desc:
(미번) NAME took the time to admire the beauty of the world.
Her passive aggressiveness surfaced once in a while, but she tried to adapt to her changing life.

ProfessionalGamer86.title: 프로게이머
ProfessionalGamer86.desc:
(미번) NAME was obsessed with video games since his hands were big enough to grip a joystick.
HECAP achieved middling finishes in several local tournaments during the 16-bit era. Nobody noticed when he retired early in his teenage years.

ToasterRepairman81.title: 토스터 수리공
ToasterRepairman81.desc:
(미번) Good with his hands and passionate about technology, NAME aspired to invent gadgets and machines that would change his home world forever.
A few failed and occasionally disastrous creations later, he gave up on his dream and took a job more befitting his skill set.

WolfPackMember79.title: 늑대 무리원
WolfPackMember79.desc:
(미번) NAME was discarded by HIS family. Raised by wolves, HE ran, hunted, and defended HIS pack.
HECAP learned to fight efficiently by tooth and claw. HECAP also learned brutally effective primal hunting strategies.

BehaviourResearch99.title: 행동 연구원
BehaviourResearch99.desc:
(미번) Captured as a feral child, NAME was forced into the ways of modern society. HECAP quickly adapted and became a behavioural researcher, eventually owning a private facility.
HECAP specialized in canines, but learned a great deal about all animals. HECAP never had interest in plants, however.

RebelStudent39.title: 반군 학생
RebelStudent39.desc:
(미번) NAME grew up in a modest but privileged family who encouraged him to play chess and shoot skeet at a young age.
As a bored student, HE found joy in challenging his teachers about the contradictions between his planet's official values and their government's policies.

PoliticalActivist61.title: 정치 활동가
PoliticalActivist61.desc:
(미번) Matt was involved with a radical political faction which worked against his homeworld's government.
The guerilla tactics training that Matt received from his associates gave him the skills to fight, but also drove him to compromise his own beliefs.

Cadet99.title: 생도
Cadet99.desc:
(미번) Born on the planet New China, NAME's father was a police chief and kept extremely strict watch over his son.
NAME had to do military-style drill exercises every day and keep his room spotlessly clean, always ready for inspection. HECAP came to abhor violence.

Flaneur73.title: 한량
Flaneur73.desc:
(미번) NAME strolled and sipped his way through the streets and cafes of HIS world, pursuing freedom at every turn, never becoming attached.
Through all this time, HE remained distrustful of others. And never took an order from anyone.

ShipTechnician62.title: 함선 전문가
ShipTechnician62.desc:
(미번) NAME was an apprentice technician on trade ships plying their routes between the stations and planets of her home system. In this job, she learned to fix and improve many machines.
Sometimes, her ship was assigned to short exploratory jaunts into dangerous regions of space.

ChiefEngineer74.title: 수석 기술자
ChiefEngineer74.desc:
(미번) As chief engineer on board a large spaceship, NAME was an expert in all things fiddly and complex.
She relied on other members of the crew for some of the basic necessities of life. She and her ship eventually disappeared into a longsleep voyage of exploration.

BlacksmithsSon72.title: 대장장이의 아들
BlacksmithsSon72.desc:
(미번) NAME's father owned the blacksmith shop in an run-down old city district. NAME would help his father whenever he could.
Later, HIS father took him as a blacksmith's apprentice and raised him as a man. NAME also to on shooting as a hobby.

BlacksmithShooter88.title: 대장장이 사수
BlacksmithShooter88.desc:
(미번) As a young blacksmith, NAME's family shop was raided by the police. HECAP shot two officers before they knocked him out and arrested him.
Sentenced to life in prison, NAME learned about traveling and raiding from other criminals.

JoywireAddict71.title: 쾌락회로 중독자
JoywireAddict71.desc:
(미번) NAME's wealthy parents provided everything HE ever wanted. After discovering joywires, HE became obsessed. Once HIS parents realized what happened, they cut HIM off.
Uncaring and often violent, HE sought his next joywire fix by any means possible.

AddictionCounsel61.title: 중독 상담사
AddictionCounsel61.desc:
(미번) After recovering from a joywire addiction, NAME adopted a non-violent way of life and vowed to help others.
Travelling between communities, HE used medicine, arts, and crafts to aid others who struggled with their own addictions.

ChildKnave65.title: 어린 악당
ChildKnave65.desc:
(미번) NAME was a child-knave of King Loteric. HECAP enjoyed the training with wooden sticks and engaging others in close combat. HECAP adapted quickly to the heat of battle and was good at spreading fire.
HECAP served his lord well, until the king died in an unfortunate accident.

BloodgameSurvivor96.title: 생존게임 생존자
BloodgameSurvivor96.desc:
(미번) NAME was sold to the Corestars Entertainment Company and used as meat in one of the company's system-wide broadcast shows.
HISCAP manipulative nature made HIM quite a nightmare, even to the audience. He was kicked out and exiled to a planet full of deadly animals, criminals and armed camera-drones.

WastelandWanderer2.title: 황무지 방랑자
WastelandWanderer2.desc:
(미번) Born into a wealthy family on a desert world, NAME was cast out after a hired attack squad destroyed his ancestral home.
The boy managed to hide in a cooling duct beneath his family's villa. Vowing revenge against the killers and whomever had hired them, Lucas struck out into the wasteland, alone.

VoidspaceRaider8.title: 진공의 침략자
VoidspaceRaider8.desc:
(미번) After years of seeking the assassin that broke up his family, NAME was offered a place with a group of space-faring raiders. He accepted, hoping to find the killer he sought.
Due to HIS seemingly-unending ability to narrowly escape danger, he earned the nickname 'Blackjack' in recognition of his luck.

PyroAssistant17.title: 방화광 조수
PyroAssistant17.desc:
(미번) On an industrial world, NAME learned early that if HE wanted to eat, HE had to work. So work HE did. Kids fit in places adults can't, and where HE was from, the safety laws were quite flexible.
HECAP was always a bit of a pyromaniac, and was banned from the kitchen after an unfortunate incident.

MachineFixer97.title: 기계 수리공
MachineFixer97.desc:
(미번) NAME was adept at dealing with mechanical problems, as long as the problem didn't involve the kitchen.
After a life spent around dangerous machinery and flammable chemicals, HE learned how to patch HIMself up pretty well. Despite the pain, HE never learned to dislike fire.

StreetUrchin39.title: 길바닥 부랑아
StreetUrchin39.desc:
(미번) After running away from home, NAME had to live on the streets.
She grew up fast, and learned early that she had to figure out how to fool people into connecting with her.

SpaceMerchant61.title: 우주 상인
SpaceMerchant61.desc: (미번) As part of a freelance interplanetary lifestyle, NAME sought to dominate her romantic interests as much as her business adversaries. When she didn't have her own ship to fly, she worked charter ships for hire.

ChildChemist73.title: 어린 약사
ChildChemist73.desc:
(미번) A midworld child, NAME was fixated on finding out exactly how everything worked.
HECAP collected rare objects and performed dangerous experiments on them. Delving deeper into these experiments, HE became isolated from the rest of the world. HECAP only left HIS research area to collect more materials.

BeastSlayer8.title: 짐승 학살자
BeastSlayer8.desc:
(미번) NAME traveled between planets, following news of animal attacks. HECAP would camp on the planet for weeks, learning about HIS prey before striking. HECAP most enjoyed hunting thrumbos.
Preferring to work alone, NAME enjoyed the thrill of the hunt, and the meat from the kill.

BrothelGofer60.title: 사창가 심부름꾼
BrothelGofer60.desc: (미번) Born on a steam-powered midworld wracked by a century of economic crises, NAME went to work at a young age. Scrounging, shoe-polishing, sewing - he did it all. But HE was most known as a brothel gofer, delivering all manner of aphrodisiacs and chemicals to the girls' rooms.

DrugLieutenant88.title: 마약 부관
DrugLieutenant88.desc:
(미번) NAME worked the drug trade under kingpin Grady Loughman. He had his men sell drugs when it was profitable, and fight the other cartels when the government came around.
His social skills kept him on top of the political game, and he always had servants to cook and clean.

LaborCampOrphan93.title: 노동수용소 고아
LaborCampOrphan93.desc: (미번) NAME lost her parents in an industrial accident and grew up in an orphans' labor camp. The camp overseers worked their charges mercilessly - but at least she was clothed and fed.

UrbworldEnforcer55.title: 도시계 집행자
UrbworldEnforcer55.desc:
(미번) NAME was an enforcer of law on an ancient urbworld.
She dealt with the worst of humanity, from protecting greedy urbworld nobility in their spire palaces to rooting out cannibal cults in the deepest reaches of the underground hive.

GameFanatic49.title: 게임 폐인
GameFanatic49.desc:
(미번) NAME was a fanatical gamer who learned to survive in virtual reality games.
Once, while attempting to prove HIS skills in the real world, HE was abducted by a criminal scientist and experimented on. HECAP escaped, but the experience stayed with him.

ToolMechanic40.title: 도구 정비공
ToolMechanic40.desc:
(미번) NAME was a famous tool mechanic on a dusty rim world.
After his firm closed due to scandal, HE joined a tribe to survive, crafting fine knives and hammers, traveling, and dealing HIS wares between settlements.

ClassClown20.title: 오락부장
ClassClown20.desc:
(미번) In the ultra-competitive environs of his glitterworld school, NAME always offered to play the class clown to diffuse tension.
HECAP developed a sense of social desperation from this, as well as an appreciation for the artistic side of comedy.

CraftShaper11.title: 공예 기술자
CraftShaper11.desc:
(미번) NAME locked HIMself in his studio for years, ordering delivery food to save time on cooking.
Eventually, HIS creations brought HIM the highest honor on Semantic World: Permission to materialize any design in minutes using the most advanced technologies.

CrimeBossChild12.title: 범죄 두목의 아이
CrimeBossChild12.desc:
(미번) NAME was adopted child of a notorious crime boss. HECAP was taught all facets of the family business, from smuggling to inventive ways of killing.
When the family was attacked, HIS father ordered HIM to hide in a secret longsleep crypt.

MercenaryLeader48.title: 용병 대장
MercenaryLeader48.desc:
(미번) Alone, NAME set out to rebuild HIS father's life's work. HECAP challenged the leader of a small band of mercenaries and took control, then led the band as they hijacked trade ships and stole valuable cargo.
HISCAP men mutinied. HECAP was abandoned, arrested, and sentenced to death.

SentimentalChild27.title: 감상적인 아이
SentimentalChild27.desc:
(미번) NAME was a nice child. When anybody had a problem, HE tried to fix it. But, being a child, HE did not always succeed. This hurt his sensitive soul.
HECAP dreamed of being a soldier who fights raiders and aliens.

SpecialForces72.title: 특수 부대원
SpecialForces72.desc:
(미번) Give me a reason to kill - a good reason!
Markus was a soldier and a skilled one - so skilled that HE entered the special forces to battle militants and xenohuman raiders. HECAP never imagined himself a lone hero, but HE played HIS part in the group well.

HackerKid65.title: 해커 꼬마
HackerKid65.desc:
(미번) Born on a high-tech world, NAME learned hack computers at a young age.
Spending many hours tinkering alone made HIM very good with machines, but very bad with humans.

BattleMechanic79.title: 전투 정비공
BattleMechanic79.desc:
(미번) NAME was a tech-obsessed mercenary in an early fusion-era system.
HECAP was unusually obsessed with gathering the right gear, and often customized HIS own equipment with original modifications.

VideoGamer94.title: 비디오 게이머
VideoGamer94.desc:
(미번) NAME grew up on a midworld, mostly locked in HIS room, playing video games. HECAP was warm-hearted, with a deep fondness for animals.
As HE grew up, HE turned to drugs to enhance his reality. During these trying times HE found passion and refuge in the gym.

DischargedSoldier36.title: 제대한 군인
DischargedSoldier36.desc:
(미번) Jeremy prostituted himself to fund his drug habits. As an escape, HE joined the military and learned to fight.
Too smart for the army, HE questioned and often disagreed with HIS superiors' decisions. This eventually led to HIS dishonorable discharge and left HIM with a chip on HIS shoulder.

MidworldLoner78.title: 중간계 외톨이
MidworldLoner78.desc: (미번) Born on a sparsely-populated midworld, NAME had a few friends. HECAP preferred to pursue his passions in solitude, whether it be tinkering with HIS motorbike, watching lengthy vidcasts about the hottest new tech, or lining up HIS figurines and shooting them down with his pellet gun.

MilitaryGunsmith58.title: 군대 총기 제작자
MilitaryGunsmith58.desc:
(미번) Inspired by a particularly evocative piece of propaganda, Robert signed up for the military in hopes of finding glory. To his dismay, however, his aptitude tests put him in the machine shop instead of on the front lines.
Later, when he saw the rows of body bags returning home, he later realized how lucky he was.

Student1.title: 학생
Student1.desc:
(미번) NAME studied chemistry and quantum mechanics for entertainment.
HECAP was very good at convincing others to do his physical work, and made it a goal in life to avoid manual labor.

Chemist38.title: 약사
Chemist38.desc: (미번) NAME was a research chemist. HECAP worked with chemicals, from pharmaceuticals to explosives, to develop new substances and treatments.

CaravanTraveler8.title: 행상단 여행자
CaravanTraveler8.desc:
(미번) NAME was born to a nomadic family of caravan traders on a rim world. HISCAP father, the caravan leader, taught him the caravan trade. Because he was able to barter or hunt for all of his food, he never had to worry about doing any farm work.
Later, HIS father retired to a farm and offered NAME the position of caravan leader.

Caravaneer75.title: 행상단원
Caravaneer75.desc: (미번) NAME was the leader of a nomadic trading caravan. It was his duty to negotiate trade deals and ensure the safety of his caravan from brigands and highwaymen. He became a master at managing wares, plotting routes, and striking good deals.

SuperSoldier19.title: 슈퍼 군인
SuperSoldier19.desc:
(미번) NAME's government ran an experimental super-soldier development program. They kidnapped thousands of infants, conditioned their minds with drugs and machines, and trained them to fight.
Most infants died, but NAME did not. He killed his first man at age six, and was fighting in field operations not long after.

SuperSoldier81.title: 슈퍼 군인
SuperSoldier81.desc:
(미번) Product of a super-soldier program run by a now-deposed government, NAME was lost. HECAP survived the final suicide attack on the enemy mothership. What now?
For the first time in his life, HE had no orders, no objectives. HECAP rose from wreckage and strove towards uncertainty, towards freedom.

HeadjackAddict49.title: 헤드잭 중독자
HeadjackAddict49.desc: (미번) Plugged in to the computer via head-jack for days at a time, NAME found HE preferred the company of computers to that of people or pets.

CorporateBuilder80.title: 기업 건축업자
CorporateBuilder80.desc:
(미번) Even as HE stewed in HIS own wasted potential, NAME found HE had a knack for moving objects quickly. It was just what the planetary mega-corps wanted in their construction divisions.
Unfortunately, the monotonous work erased HIS remaining creative impulses.

UrbworldArmyBrat71.title: 도시계 군인 자녀
UrbworldArmyBrat71.desc:
(미번) NAME grew up on an urbworld military base. HECAP was too young to fight, but HE learned to make HIMself useful in other ways.
HECAP became familiar with guns and military equipment, but never really got in touch with the natural world.

MechanicsEngineer7.title: 기계 기술자
MechanicsEngineer7.desc:
(미번) NAME loved solving problems and, with HIS steady hands and a reputation for quality work, earned a job as a mechanical engineer. HECAP built and redesigned devices of all shapes and sizes.
Eventually, HE was able to pick and choose HIS corporate clients. HECAP made several wealthy friends, as well as a few powerful enemies.

CaravanTraveler5.title: 행상단 여행자
CaravanTraveler5.desc: (미번) Born to a family of traveling merchants, NAME was mentored by HIS father in the ways of being a trader. HECAP was often tasked with caring for the pack animals. Due to HIS nomadic lifestyle, HE hunted and bartered for HIS food.

Caravaneer77.title: 행상단원
Caravaneer77.desc:
(미번) NAME was the leader of a caravan. HECAP was responsible for the safety of HIS caravan and was the head negotiator in countless trade deals.
HECAP and HIS people prospered, but their wealth made them a target for brigands. They often had to take up arms to fend off bandits and highwaymen.

Punk70.title: 불량배
Punk70.desc: NAME(은)는 고등학생들에게 싸구려 담배를 팔며 유년기를 보냈습니다. 보통 잘라낸 잡초로 만들었습니다.

GameDeveloper59.title: 게임 개발자
GameDeveloper59.desc:
NAME(은)는 독립게임 개발자였습니다.
이른 성공 후에, HIS 커리어는 잘못된 아이디어, 지켜지지 않은 약속, 그로 인한 절박한 광고 시도로 인해 완전히 추락했습니다.
